She is asking for this loan for the purchase of liquid weed spray, insecticide, urea, and orange plants. With the help of the loan, she wants to clean the farm. 

She buys and sells in the city of Montalvo each week. Her dream is to buy more land and fix the house. 

The biggest challenge this woman has faced is a lack of money. In her free time, she likes to make friends and talk with the neighbors.

loans.use: to purchase liquid weed spray, insecticide, urea, orange plants.

loans.name: Pedro Alvaro

texts.es: Pedro de 51 años de edad se dedica al comercio de víveres, ranchos, refrescos y cosméticos en un punto comercial en el centro de la ciudad. Su negocio inició cuando procedente de Bogotá, la linda capital de Colombia, llegó a la ciudad de Barranquilla, pues había sido trasladado  en el año 1988, cuando trabajaba para una compañía, como profesional de la economía. Como a esta empresa  posteriormente la liquidaron, el dinero que le entregaron por tiempo trabajado, lo invirtió en una actividad comercial, que le generará ingresos suficientes para sostener a su familia conformada por su esposa y dos hijos, hoy en las edades de 15 y 27 años. En su tienda de víveres, últimamente ha agregado electrodomésticos menores, que adquiere con precios de oportunidad en las promociones que hacen los almacenes y esto le representa un ingreso más. Su actividad comercial tiene 13 años de estar funcionando y en ella  la mayor parte de sus ventas las hace de contado y también tiene algunos proveedores que le acreditan  los productos que compra. Sus ventas las realiza en ambas modalidades, contado y crédito.  Gracias a su constancia y a su espíritu de trabajo, ha logrado adquirir dos locales, en el mercado público, donde funcionan sus negocios. Con el apoyo de  su esposa  quien trabaja en una empresa estatal, ha logrado condiciones de bienestar para su familia, así tienen una hija que ya es profesional mientras su otro hijo cursa estudios, a quienes han  logrado ofrecerles un techo digno, que es por lo que mas  han realizado esfuerzos. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará víveres al por mayor, para continuar comprando por volúmenes, que le permitan obtener descuentos y trasladárselos a sus clientes, que son la razón de ser de su negocio.
texts.en:
51-year old Pedro earns his living by selling supplies, food, soft drinks, and cosmetics from a store in the town centre. He started his business after he arrived in Barranquilla from Bogotá, the lovely capital of Colombia. He had been transferred there in 1988 when he was working for a financial institution. This business eventually failed, but Pedro received some money for the time he’d worked. He used this money to buy a business which generated enough income to support his wife and two children, now aged 15 and 27. 

Pedro recently started selling small appliances in his store. He bought them at good prices from warehouses, and they bring in additional income. His business has been in operation for 13 years, and the majority of the sales are for cash. As well, he has some suppliers who let him buy on credit. Sales are both in cash and on credit. 

Through determination and hard work, Pedro has managed to acquire two spots in the public market. With the help of his wife who works for a state company, he has managed to provide his family with a good standard of living. One daughter has already qualified as a professional, while their son is still studying. A lot of effort and hard work has ensured that the family has a decent home. 

Now Pedro is seeking a loan, the first he’s had with the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, to buy supplies wholesale and in large quantities for lower prices which he can pass on to his customers, who are the reason why he is in business.

loans.use: to buy supplies at wholesale prices

loans.name: Antonina

texts.ru:
Антонина уже не первый раз пользуется услугами КИВА. В последний раз она брала кредит в ноябре 2011 года. Он был использован на развитие бизнеса. Зимний рабочий сезон выдался непростым, погодные условия очень усложняли работу, наблюдался существенный спад торговли. Тем не менее, Антонина смогла получить прибыль и даже приобрела на нее новую бытовую технику.  
В этот раз Антонина берет новый кредит в размере 12 000 гривен с целью закупить сезонную женскую одежду для последующей реализации летом. Каждая семья в Украине пытается найти какой-то способ немного оздоровиться и отдохнуть летом. Семья Антонины не исключение. Антонина тоже надеется вложить сумму, полученную от реализации дополнительно приобретенного товара в отдых семьи на базе отдыха в Кирилловке, на Азовском море.  
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
This is not the first time Antonina uses Kiva's services. She took her last loan in November of 2011, and used it to expand her business. The winter season was difficult, with adverse weather making work hard, and business was slow. Nevertheless, Antonina was able to make profits and even bought some household appliances.

This time, Antonina is taking a loan of 12 000 hryvnia in order to purchase seasonal women's clothing for sale during summer. Every Ukrainian family tries to find a way to rest and revitalize in the summer, and Antonina's family is no exception. She hopes to use her profits from sales of additional merchandise to pay for her family's vacation at a resort in Kirillovka on the sea of Azov.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal women's clothing for sale in the summer

loans.name: Ezekiel

texts.en:
Ezekiel is an entrepreneur who has made progress in his goal thanks to his capacity for work and love for his family, which consists of his two children. 

He is the owner of a business, through which he generates income for the family, managing his business of supplying bread and sugar to retailers, which he began 5 years ago. 

Little by little Ezekiel has been able to expand what he offers, delivering his products to clients on time. Now he has a domestic market made up of his neighbors, many of them working and retailers. His dream is to grow and expand his market, but his working capital is often insufficient in order to meet his goals of prosperity. This is the reason for which he is asking for a Kiva loan, his first financing through the Yehu Microfinance Trust, in order to purchase more stock of bread and sugar with which he will be able to get substantial discounts by buying in volume. This is the groundwork for the success of his Kiva loan that has him enthused and dreaming.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of bread and sugar

loans.name: Marco Patricio

texts.es:
Marco es un hombre de 30 años y actualmente reside con su esposa y dos hijos en la ciudad de Latacunga, en la Provincia de Cotopaxi. Latacunga está ubicada en el centro del Ecuador en las faldas del volcán activo más alto del mundo, el Cotopaxi, que ya ha destruido a la ciudad tres veces desde su fundación. En la ciudad se puede apreciar la arquitectura de la época colonial y sus habitantes se caracterizan por celebrar varias fiestas que contienen creencias de varias culturas como la “Mama Negra” que es una celebración originada con tradiciones africanas, indígenas y españolas.  
Marco se dedica a elaborar y vender escobas trabajando 8 horas al día. Él no continuó sus estudios secundarios por falta de recursos;  empezó su negocio hace 10 años. Él quiere ganar más ingresos para su familia para darles una vida más digna y un futuro mejor para sus hijos. Por lo tanto, Marco solicita un préstamo a Kiva para poder invertir en más material y poder elaborar un mayor número de escobas ya que la demanda de este producto es mayor de la que puede producir. De esta manera, su negocio crecerá y él y su familia podrán mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marco is a 30-year-old man who currently lives with his wife and two children in the city of Latacunga, in Cotopaxi Province. Latacunga is located in the center of Ecuador on the flanks of Cotopaxi, the highest active volcano in the world, which has already destroyed the city three times since it was founded. In the city, one can observe colonial-era architecture; its inhabitants are known for celebrating several festivals based on the beliefs of various cultures, such as the "Mama Negra" [Black Mother], which is a celebration originating in African, indigenous, and Spanish traditions.

Marco works eight hours a day in the manufacture and sale of brooms. He did not continue his secondary education due to a lack of resources; he started his business ten years ago. He wants to earn more income for his family to give them a more decent life and to give his children a better future. For that reason, Marco is requesting a loan from Kiva so he can invest in more materials to make a larger number of brooms; the demand for this product is greater than what he can produce. This way, his business will grow and he and his family will be able to improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials for the manufacture of brooms.

loans.name: Lester Adalis

texts.es:
Don Lester  es originario de San Lorenzo- Teustepe, de oficio comerciante en el negocio de pulpería, casado, padre de dos hijos de 7 y 2 años de edad,  el  realizo  sus estudios de secundaria con el apoyo de sus padres pero su situación económica le impidió continuar. Inicio  su negocio por sus tíos ya que ellos tenían negocios y el con el tiempo  fue obteniendo experiencia, luego decide independizarse, pone su propio negocio, empezó vendiendo de manera ambulante fresco y productos lácteos, luego con ahorros que tenia reforzó sus ventas invirtiendo en productos básicos para el negocio, después con esfuerzo propio y la ayuda de su padre que lo apoyo estableció su negocio en su domicilio, compro un frízer para mantener sus productos fresco y vitrinas para exhibir su mercadería. En su negocio recibe el apoyo de su esposa que le ayuda con la administración de la pulpería, mientras que el sale a vender en una motocicleta a las comarcas mas cercas de la comunidad.
Su expectativa es crecer más  en mercadería para su negocio  con el objetivo de aumentar sus ventas. Requiere el préstamo para la compra de productos como leche, crema, queso, arroz, jabón, azúcar, etc, el estima que este crédito le ayudara porque podra surtir su pulpería con productos mas solicitados por los clientes, sus planes futuros es aumentar el área del local, su  meta próxima es seguir trabajando en su negocio, obtener mas ganancias, cancelar el préstamo y poder salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Don Lester is a native of San Lorenzo-Teustepe. He is a storekeeper at a small shop, is married, and is the father of two children, ages 7 and 2. He finished high school with the help of his parents, but his economic situation stopped him from being able to continue after that. He started working for his aunt and uncle, since they had a business, and with time he gained experience. Then he decided to become independent, created his own business, and began selling juice and dairy products on the street.

Later, with some savings he had, he increased his sales by investing in basic goods for the store. Then, through his own efforts and the help of his father, he set up a business in his home. He bought a freezer to keep his goods fresh, and display cases to exhibit his merchandise. His wife helped him with the administrative details of his business while he went off on motorcycle to sell to some areas near his community. 

His hope is to increase the amount of merchandise he has for his business, with the objective of increasing his sales. He needs the loan for the purchase of goods like milk, cream, cheese, rice, soap, sugar, etc. He thinks the loan will help him because he can move forward with the business by having what the clients ask for the most. His plan for the future is to increase the size of his business. His next goal is to keep working at his business, to earn more, to repay the loan, and to help his family get ahead.

loans.use: for the purchase of goods like milk, cream, cheese, rice, soap, sugar, etc

loans.name: Renan Miguel

texts.es:
RENAN MIGUEL tiene 52 años de edad, es casado, tiene 8 hijos vive con su esposa e hijos en la ciudad de Montalvo Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la  VRC 3 cruces esta ventanilla se dedica al cultivo de cacao, naranja y maíz.

RENAN MIGUEL se dedica a la siembra de maíz. Solita el crédito para comprar semillas, insecticidas , urea, líquidos para la maleza.

Con el apoyo del crédito podrá comprar la semilla y fertilizantes. Realiza sus compras y ventas cada semana en la ciudad de Montalvo.

El sueño del señor es construir una casa para vivir tranquilo con la familia. El desafío al que el se enfrenta es la falta de estudio.

En su tiempo libre se dedica a descansar.
texts.en:
Renan Miguel is 52 years old and married with eight children. He lives with his wife and children in the city of Montalvo in the Los Rios Province. 

He is a member of the communal bank, "Three Crosses." This bank makes a living cultivating cacao, oranges, and corn. 

Renan Miguel makes a living planting corn. He is asking for the loan to buy seeds, insecticide, urea, and liquid weed spray.

With the help of the loan, he will be able to buy seeds and fertilizers. He buys and sells each week in the city of Montalvo. 

His dream is to build a house to live in peacefully with his family. The challenge he has faced is his lack of education.

In his free time he likes to rest.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, insecticides, urea, and weed spray.

loans.name: Luis Alfredo

texts.es:
Luis Alfredo tiene 24 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene una hija, vive con la esposa y con la hija de dos años de edad en el Cantón Ventanas provincia de los Ríos. 

VRC CEVALLOS, SE ENCUENTRA UBICADA EN EL RECINTO SAN FRANCISCO, PERTENECE A LA PARROQUIA SAN JUAN DE PUEBLO VIEJO SE DEDICAN A LABORES AGRICOLAS.

Luis Alfredo se dedica a la cría de animales como gallinas y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar pollos, patos, cerdos.

Con el apoyo del crédito podrá comprar mas animales para la cría. Realiza sus compras y ventas en San Juan , Ventanas y Babahoyo.

El sueño del señor es tener un negocio mas grande.
El desafío al que se enfrenta es la deuda de un socio.
En su tiempo libre  se dedica a los animales y a su hogar.
texts.en:
Luis Alfredo is 24 and lives in a common-law marriage, and has a daughter. He lives with his wife and two-year-old daughter in the Ventanas Canton, Province of Los Rios. 

The communal bank "Cevallos" is located in the region of San Francisco. It belongs to the parish San Juan de Pueblo Viejo. They make a living doing agricultural labor.

Luis Alfredo makes a living raising animals like roosters and pigs. He is asking for this loan to buy chickens, ducks, and pigs. 

With the help of the loan, he can buy more animals to raise. He buys and sells in San Juan, Ventanas, and Babahoyo. 

His dream is to have a bigger business.

The challenge he has faced is mistrust of one of the members.

In his free time he tends to the animals and to his home.

loans.use: to buy chickens, ducks, and pigs

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
This is Grace. She previously availed a 11,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items and products needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help for the education of her children and in their personal, household, and business expenditures. 

Grace would like to apply for a loan of 10,000 PHP to pay for grocery items and products needed in her business. The more items displayed at the store, the better. More items to sell will result in better profit. The profits from the business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and pay for her children's educational expenses. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Grace dreams of giving her family a good future through all her hard work. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and also draws strength and inspiration from the word of God.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Carlos Alfonso

texts.es:
Carlos vive hace algunos años en San Buenaventura, una parroquia urbana de la ciudad de Latacunga, ubicada en la Provincia del Cotopaxi – Ecuador; esta parroquia debe su nombre a su patrono el Dr. San Buenaventura, personaje que según la creencia popular ha realizado muchos milagros a los habitantes de la zona. Es en este sitio donde Carlos, desde hace dos años,  ofrece su arte musical, ya sea a través de interpretaciones con su guitarra en alguna concurrida esquina de la urbe, o a través de mágicas interpretaciones con su violín o piano eléctrico en alguna fiesta donde haya sido contratado.

La parroquia de San Buenavetura y toda la provincia en sí, tienen mucho apego a las artes musicales, es gracias a esto que Carlos desarrolló su gusto hacia la música desde su época en el colegio y decidió deleitar con este arte a las personas.

Carlos solicita por primera vez un crédito a Kiva para adquirir unos parlantes o amplificación que le permitan mejorar el servicio musical que ofrece en las fiestas y en las casas que lo contratan. El sabe que a pesar de trabajar cerca de 12 horas al día, siempre es necesario brindar un mejor servicio y por eso siempre está superándose, esforzándose y distribuyendo el tiempo de trabajo con sus estudios.

Su sueño es tener un grupo musical muy bien equipado, pero sabe que para lograrlo debe dar un primer paso y esto lo conseguirá con el dinero que Kiva le entrega.

El siguiente paso para Carlos es obtener un mayor ingreso que permita ayudar económicamente a su familia.
texts.en:
Carlos has lived for a number of years in San Buenaventura, an urban parish in the city of Latacunga, located in Cotopaxi province, Ecuador.  This parish is named after the patron Saint Dr. San Buenaventura, a person who, according to popular beliefs, accomplished many miracles for the inhabitants of this area.  This is also the place where Carlos, for 2 years, has offered his musical art, whether it is through performances with his guitar in a crowded corner of the city, or through his magical performances on the violin or electric piano at a party where he has been hired to play.

In San Buenaventura parish, and in the region as a whole, the people have a strong attachment to the musical arts.  Thanks to this, Carlos developed his love of music ever since he was a schoolboy, and he decided to delight people with this art.

This is the first time that Carlos has requested a loan from Kiva.  He will use the loan to acquire some speakers, or amplification, which will allow him to improve the quality of music that he can offer in the parties and houses where he is hired.  He knows that, in spite of working about 12 hours a day, he always needs to provide better service.  For this reason he is always working hard and exerting himself to excel, and allocating time between his work and his studies. 

His dream is to have a well-equipped musical group, but he knows that in order to do this, he must take the first step.  He will do this with the money that Kiva is providing him.

Carlos' next step will be to obtain a higher income that will allow him to help his family financially.

loans.use: to buy sound equipment for his musical performance business

loans.name: Mykola

texts.ru:
Микола проживает и работает в Хусте. Ему 24 года. Он предоставляет транспортные услуги, занимаясь перевозкой пассажиров на собственном автомобиле. Этим бизнесом Микола занимается уже 3 года. У него есть высшее образование. Микола очень трудолюбивый, настойчивый, преданный своему делу человек. 

Микола обратился в КИВА за кредитом с целью приобрести газовую установку в свой автомобиль, чтобы экономить на горючем. Сейчас в жизни у Миколы происходит много важных событий: он строит дом и собирается жениться. Естественно, с этим связано много затрат. Микола надеется за счет снижения затрат в бизнесе сэкономить такие нужные средства для предстоящей свадьбы и окончания строительства дома для будущей семьи.    
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Mykola lives and works in Khoost. He is 24 years old. For the past 3 years, he has offered taxi services by transporting passengers in his own vehicle. Mykola has a post-secondary degree. He is a very hard-working and persistent person who is dedicated to his business. He has turned to Kiva for a loan in order to convert his vehicle to natural gas, which will allow him to save money on fuel.

Presently, many important events are taking place in Mykola's life: he is building a house and getting ready to marry. Naturally, this entails multiple expenses. Mykola is hoping that by decreasing his business expenditures, he will be able to save money for his upcoming wedding and for finishing construction of the house for his future family.

loans.use: to convert his taxi to natural gas in order to save money on fuel

loans.name: Aslamjon

texts.ru: Асламчон проживает в районе Пяндж. Он более пяти лет занимается скотоводством. В основном он разводит крупнорогатый скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Ему 22 года. Он холост. Его родители работают в дехканском хозяйстве. Он берет кредит для закупа бычков.
texts.en:
Aslamjon lives in the Pyandj region. For over five years, he has been raising livestock, mainly cattle, for sale. Aslamjon is 22 year old and single. His parents work on an orchard farm. 

Aslamjon is taking this loan to purchase calves.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Esteban Clemente

texts.es:
ESTEBAN CLEMENTE tiene 81 años es casado , tiene 6 hijos vive con la esposa los hijos todos son casados y viven aparte en la ciudad de Montalvo Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC. Las 3 cruces esta ventanilla se dedica al cultivo de cacao, naranja y maíz.

ESTEBAN CLEMENTE se dedica a la siembra de cacao, platano. Solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos, urea, fertilizantes.

Con el apoyo del crédito podría comprar insumos que le hacen mucha falta . Realiza sus compras y ventas en la ciudad de Montalvo cada semana.

El sueño del señor es salir del mal tiempo económico.

El desafío al que se enfrenta es la falta de dinero. En su tiempo libre le gusta descansar.
texts.en: Esteban Clemente is 81 years old. He is married and has 6 children. He lives with his wife; his children are all married and live in the city of Montalvo, de los Ríos Province. He is a member of Las 3 Cruces communal bank; they grow cocoa, oranges and corn. Esteban Clemente sows cocoa and bananas for a living. He requests a loan to buy supplies, urea and fertilizers. Thanks to the loan he will be able to afford much needed supplies. He makes his purchases and sales in Montalvo city every week. His dream is to get through the bad financial times. The challenge he faces is the lack of money. In his spare time, he likes to rest.

loans.use: to buy supplies, urea and fertilizers.

loans.name: Zoila

texts.es:
La socia se dedica al negocio de venta de comida,la socia prepara desayuno,almuerzo y cena,la socia vende en el mercado desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de comida.La socia solicita el credito para comprar productos para cocinar como pollo,verduras,carne y arroz.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member works selling food. She prepares breakfast, lunch, and dinner and sells it in the market from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. 

By means of this business, she keeps her family going. The member's dream is to grow her food-selling business. She is requesting the loan to purchase cooking ingredients such as chicken, vegetables, meat, and rice.

The member is happy about the loan and committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to purchase products for food preparation, such as chicken, vegetables, meat, and rice.

loans.name: Franklin

texts.en:
Franklin is an entrepreneur who has made progress in his goal thanks to his capacity of work and love for his family, which consists of his wife and six children, ranging in ages from 2 years old to 16 years old. Franklin began his business 2 years ago. He is the owner of a grocery business through which he generates income for the family. Little by little, he has been able to expand what he offers; buying and selling maize - now he has a domestic market made up of his neighbors. 

Franklin is asking for a Kiva loan to buy sacks of green vegetables, tomatoes, and coconuts. He will be able to get substantial discounts by buying in large volume. This is the groundwork for the success of his Kiva loan, which enables him to achieve his dreams.

loans.use: to buy sacks of green vegetables, tomatoes, and coconuts.

loans.name: Saima's Group

texts.en:
Saima is a 29-year-old married mother of a son and daughter, both too young to yet attend school. She knows the art of embroidery, sewing for her neighboring clients to help support her husband financially.

Saima is requesting a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for the expansion of her husband's sanitation-supplies business. With the loan he will buy taps, water pipes and other items that will allow him to complete his clients' orders on time and increase his profits.

He has been operating his business for the past many years, and Saima is confident that he will attain more success in his business through the loan.

Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book called Asasah Passbook is Saima.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her husband's sanitary-supplies business.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline, 38 years old, is married to George and has four children aged 18, 14, 9 and 4 years old. For the past seven years she has been operating a beauty shop and boutique, earning a monthly income KES 20,000.

Introduced to us by one of our field officers, Caroline is requesting her first loan from KADET LTD. to purchase a stock of cosmetics including hair weaves, sprays, makeup kits and hair relaxers. She will reinvest the anticipated profits in her business.

Caroline hopes to open another beauty shop in a nearby town.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of cosmetics like hair weaves, sprays, makeup kits and hair relaxers.

loans.name: Faustina

texts.en:
Faustina, a 57-year-old woman with five children, is married to a fisherman. Faustina helps her husband sell his catch and also buys fish to sell. She also grows seaweeds to sell, working hard to support her family, especially her children's college education.

Faustina plans to use this loan to purchase fishing nets, hooks and other materials. She hopes to increase her income and be able to make improvements to their house.

loans.use: to purchase fishing nets, hooks and other materials.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick has been in the motorcycle transport business in Nakuru town for the last 4 years. He is 27 years old and is married to Mary. They have two children aged 2 years and nine months old.

This will be his first loan term with KADET LTD and he plans to use this loan amount to buy another motorcycle and improve his transport business. With the anticipated income, he plans to invest more in the transport business.

In the future, Patrick hopes to grow his business, make more income, and buy land as well as improve the living standards of his family.

loans.use: To buy another motorcycle.

loans.name: Tutikhon

texts.ru: Тутихон заботливая мать и любящая жена. Её муж находится на заработках в Российской  Федерации. Чтобы не ждать денег от мужа она решила начать свой бизнес. Она хочет начать свой бизнес по переработке и продаже сухофруктов. Она с детства вместе с родителями занималась в переработке сухофруктов. Она прошла тренинг по «Старт-ап» и  хочет развивать свои знания, которые помогут в  открытии бизнеса. Тутихон запрашивает займ для покупки сада абрикосовых деревьев с целью переработки абрикоса.
texts.en: Tutikhon is a caring mother and loving wife. Her husband is currently working in Russia. Tutikhon has decided to launch her own business so as not to constantly rely on money from her husband. She would like to start processing and selling dry fruit, something she used to do with her parents as a child. Tutikhon has taken a course on business start-up, and would like to apply this new knowledge to her new venture. She is requesting a loan to purchase a harvest of apricots for processing.

loans.use: to purchase apricots for drying and resale

loans.name: Srey's Group

texts.en:
Srey, 42, is married with five children, two of whom work for a garment factory to support the family. She earns a living in a village of the Kandal Stoeng district through farming rice while her husband works as a paid construction worker. She has been in this business for 17 years. A lack of working capital is her main challenge to support her family's business. 

Srey received her first loan with VisionFund 11 cycles ago and she completely repaid the loans with VisionFund. The past loans have helped her better support her family. Now she can earn around 25,000 KHR from her current business. She is now leading her group of 6 members to apply for a loan. As the leader, she will use her portion to buy fertilizers for farming. She hopes to grow her crop healthfully and also hopes to make a living better.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farming.

loans.name: Jennelyn

texts.en:
Jennelyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years. She earns additional income from a sari-sari store.

Jennelyn is borrowing PHP 18,000 through NWTF to buy additional ingredients for her food vending business.

Jennelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money that she can afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: To buy additional ingredients for her food vending business

loans.name: Mikayel

texts.ru:
Микаел занимается сельскохозяйственным бизнесом в деревне Бех, Сюникского региона. На своей ферме он разводит крупный рогатый скот, свиней, овец, коз и пчел. На своей ферме Микаел производит большой ассортимент сельскохозяйственной продукции на продажу: говядину, свинину, баранину, молоко, мед и овечью шерсть. У Микаела много постоянных покупателей как в деревне Бехи, так и в городе Капане. Микаелу очень нравится заниматься сельским хозяйством, поэтому он работает без выходных с раннего утра до позднего вечера. 
Микаелу 31 год. После службы в армии, он вместе с семьей переехал в Россию. Но в скором времени Микаел вернулся на родину и начал заниматься сельским хозяйством.
Благодаря своему бизнесу Микаел содержит себя. Микаел еще не женат, но он надеется создать семью в ближайшем будущем. 
Микаелу необходим кредит на сумму 500.000 драм для покупки большой партии  корма для животных.
texts.en:
Mikayel operates his agricultural business in the village of Bekh, located in the Syuniksk region. On his farm, he raises cattle, pigs, sheep, goats and bees, which allows him to produce a large variety of products for sale: beef, pork, mutton, milk, honey, and sheep's wool. Mikayel has many regular customers both in the village of Bekh and in the city of Kapan. Mikayel loves being a farmer and works every day from early morning to late evening.

Mikayel is 31 years old. After serving in the army, he moved to Russia with his parents. However, he soon returned to his homeland and became a farmer. Mikayel is self-sufficient thanks to his business. He is not yet married, but is hoping to start a family in the near future.

Mikayel would like to obtain a loan of 500,000 dram to purchase a large shipment of animal feed.

loans.use: to buy fodder for his farm animals

loans.name: Sara

texts.ru: Саре 52 года, замужем, имеет 4 детей. Сара в  качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи занимается полеводством и животноводством, начав этот бизнес  в 2002 году с покупки 3 овец. Благодаря упорному  труду Сары в ее хозяйстве на сегодня имеется 2 коровы с телятами, 10 овец и 5 коз, ежемесячная прибыль от  продажи молока и молочных продуктов составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Сара обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота  - молодняка.  Доходы от кредита Сара планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего хозяйства.
texts.en:
Sara is 52 years old, married, and has four children.  As her family's main source of income, Sara farms and raises livestock, a business she began in 2002 with the purchase of three sheep.  Thanks to her hard work, today Sara has 2 cows and their calves, 10 sheep, and five goats, which bring her a monthly profit of 10,000 som (KGS) from the sale of milk and dairy products.

With the goal of further developing her business, Sara applied to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of young livestock.  Sara is planning to invest the income from her loan in further developing her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Germana

texts.en:
Germana is from the town of Trinidad, Bohol. She is 38 years old and is a married woman with seven children. Her husband works as a farmer and vulcanizer.

Germana supports her family by raising hogs. She hopes to increase her income, be able to pay for her children's school fees, and buy school supplies. She has requested a loan to purchase pig feed and vitamins. This loan will help keep Germana's pigs healthy and make them more salable.

loans.use: to purchase pig feed and vitamins.

loans.name: Hugo Rolando

texts.es:
Hugo es una persona de 19 años, que se considera una persona responsable, tranquilo y muy trabajador. Hugo vive con sus padres en Pujií que se encuentra cerca de Latacunga.

Hugo trabaja con sus padres en la crianza y venta de animales como cuyes, conejos; negocio que le ayuda a sustentar los gastos de su hogar, al momento necesita incrementar su negocio con la reproducción de sus animales, es por eso que realiza un crédito a Fodemi el mismo que será invertido en la compra de cuyes y conejos de raza para reproducirlos y que la nueva generación sea de buena calidad, también utilizará el crédito en la reconstrucción de los corrales ya que los actuales estan detereorados.

Hugo sueña en tener un terreno para poedr tener su propio negocio de animales y así poder sustentar sus estudios.
texts.en:
Hugo is a 19 year-old who considers himself to be a responsible, calm and very hard-working person. Hugo lives with his parents in Pujií, which is located near Latacunga.

Hugo works with his parents raising and selling animals like guinea pigs and rabbits. This business helps meet their household expenses. At the moment, he needs to expand the business by reproducing their animals, so this is why he is taking out a loan through Fodemi. The loan will be invested in the purchase of well-bred guinea pigs and rabbits for breeding, so that the next generation will be high-quality. Hugo will also use the loan to reconstruct the animals' cages, as they are currently in disrepair. 

Hugo dreams of having a plot of land where he can have his own animal business, so that he can support his studies.

loans.use: to buy well-bred guinea pigs and rabbits for breeding, and to rebuild the cages where he keeps them

loans.name: Marciana

texts.en:
This is Marciana, 62, a resident of Taguig City, Philippines. She is a single parent and mother of five children. At this time, she is working hard to sustain their everyday expenses.

Marciana maintains a direct selling business. She sells clothing, footwear, undergarments, cosmetics, and other products through the popular direct-selling brands like Avon, Fullerlife, Natasha, Boardwalk, Marikina Shoe Exchange, and others. A customer's order is bought in cash by the dealer and then given to the customer with a one-month-to-pay credit. Dealers' prices are lower than those in the catalog, and this is how dealers earn a profit. Marciana also has a dress shop for additional income. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of PHP 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, Marciana is requesting a loan of PHP 20,000. She will use the loan to buy orders for her customers. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 
 
Marciana dreams of renovating her house and growing her business in the coming years. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the word of God, which she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for additional supplies and merchandise needed in her business

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose works hard to support her family. She is married and has a used clothing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 10 years.

Rose requested a loan of PHP 17,000 through NWTF to buy more used clothing to sell. In the future, she would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy more used clothing to sell.

loans.name: Mayé

texts.fr: Mayé est âgée de 45 ans et vit au Bénin. Mayé est mariée à un certain Anatole. Le couple a un enfant qui est scolarisé. En plus de leur enfant, le couple a un autre enfant à charge. Mayé et son mari subviennent ensemble aux différents besoins du ménage. Mayé n'a pas fréquenté l'école. Il y a vingt deux ans environs que Mayé mène comme activité la vente de produits divers et des cartes de recharge téléphoniques de façon secondaire dans sa boutique au Bénin. Mayé achète ses produits dans une ville du Bénin. Grâce au revenu que lui génère cette activité, Mayé contribue aux différentes dépenses de sa famille. Pour satisfaire aux besoins de sa clientèle de plus en plus grandissante, Mayé sollicite pour une cinquième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les crédits reçus antérieurement par Mayé ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Mayé is 45 years old and lives in Benin.  She is married to a man named Anatole.  

Mayé and her husband have one child, who goes to school.  Besides their child, they also have another child in their care.

The couple jointly takes care of the various needs of the household.

Mayé never attended school.  For the past twenty-two years, she has been selling various goods and, additionally, phone recharge cards.  She buys her goods in a town in Benin and sells in her own shop, in Benin.

Thanks to the income she makes through this activity, Mayé contributes to her family's various expenses.

In order to meet the needs of an increasing number of customers, she is requesting a fifth loan from ALIDé.  Her previous loans have been duly repaid.

loans.use: to buy phone recharge cards and other various goods.

loans.name: Topchugul

texts.ru: Топчугул 58 лет, замужем. Топчугул в  качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи занимается полеводством и животноводством, начав этот бизнес  в 1994 году с суммы в 8,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному  труду Топчугул в ее хозяйстве на сегодня имеется 4 коровы с телятами, 15 голов мелкого рогатого скота, ежемесячная прибыль от  продажи молока и молочных продуктов составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Топчугул обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота  - молодняка.  Доходы от кредита Топчугул планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего хозяйства.
texts.en:
Topchugul is 58 years old and married.  As her family's main source of income, Topchugul farms and raises livestock, a business she began in 1994 with 8,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her hard work, today Topchugul has four couws and their calves, and 15 head of sheep and goats, with a monthly profit of 15,000 som (KGS) from the sale of milk and dairy products. 

With the goal of further developing her business, Topchugul applied to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of young livestock.  Topchugul is planning to invest the income from her loan in the further development of her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Pablo Antonio

texts.es:
Pablo es originario de la comarca la laguna-Teustepe, casado, padre de 7 hijos de los cuales 5 tiene a su cargo, pablo de oficio agricultor se dedica a la siembra de frijol y maíz. Inicio su actividad ayudándole a sus padres en las tierras, luego a la edad de 18 años decide independizarse, empieza a sembrar por si solo con dinero propio ya que anteriormente trabajaba cuidando una finca que queda cerca de la comunidad, pero los ingresos que ganaba no cubrían los gastos de la siembra  por ese motivo busco el apoyo de instituciones financieras para invertir mas en su negocio, en los trabajos agrícolas lo apoyan los dos hijos mayores uno de 25 y 23 años además paga mozo. Pablo comercializa sus productos en la misma comarca para evitar gastos de transporte.

Pablo además de ser agricultor trabaja como guarda de seguridad  de una empresa privada para buscar otros ingresos para la familia. Pablo requiere de este crédito para pagar mano de obra, comprar insumos, abonos y fertilizantes, que le hacen falta para la siembra del frijol y maíz de este año. Este crédito será de ayuda ya que podrá darle mejor preparación a las tierras y obtendrá mayor rendimiento de la cosecha, sus planes futuros  es cancelar el crédito con las ganancias que le genere la cosecha y lo que le quede hacerle mejora a su vivienda, sus metas próximas es mantener su negocio activo, generar mejores ingresos para poder salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en: Pablo is from the laguna-Teustepe region. He is married and has 7 children, 5 of whom he is in charge of. Pablo is an agricultural worker and sows beans and corn for a living. He started in this activity by helping his parents working the lands. Then, when he was 18 years old, he decided to become independent, and started sowing on his own, with his own money, since before that he had been working taking care of a farm nearby the community. But that income was not enough to cover the expenses of the sowing, which is why he looked for the support of financial institutions in order to invest more in his business. His eldest sons, who are 25 and 23 years old, help him with the agricultural work, and he also hires a farm laborer. Pablo sells his products in the region where he lives to avoid transportation costs. Besides working in agriculture, Pablo works as a security guard for a private company, in order to earn some extra income for his family. Pablo requests this loan to pay for labor and to buy supplies and fertilizers, which he needs in order to sow beans and corn this year. This loan will be very helpful since it will allow him to better prepare the lands and get a better yield from the harvest. His plans for the future are, to repay the loan with the profits earned from the harvest, and with the money left, make some improvements to his home. His next goals are to keep his business active and generate a better income so that he can pull through together with his family.

loans.use: to pay for labor and to buy supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Jovita

texts.en:
This is Jovita, 40, a resident of Taguig City, Philippines. She is married to Anastacio, a driver, and she has four children. She, together with her husband and children, manages their household while operating her business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Jovita operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store that sells groceries, toiletries, and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a small amount of cooking oil, or an egg. Jovita earns a profit by getting supplies at wholesale prices and reselling them by the piece. Her store is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, Jovita is requesting a PHP 35,000 loan. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries, and beverages to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Jovita hopes her business will grow in the coming years and dreams of being able to give her children a good future and high quality education through all her hard work. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members every week to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God, which she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Gertrudes

texts.en:
Gertrudes lives in the town of Trinidad, Bohol with her family. She is 42 years old, married, and has 4 school-aged children. Her husband is a farmer.

Gertrudes runs a small sari-sari store business. She sells canned goods, toiletries, and snack foods to her community. She also sells herbal products. Gertrudes also supports her husband in keeping their farm free of weeds and pests. She does her best to sustain their family and send their children to school. She plans to use her loan to buy fertilizers and more merchandise to sell. 

Gertrudes hopes for her children to finish college and have bright futures.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and more merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Leonarda

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Leonada; La socia continua con su negocio de compra y venta de pollos,la socia lleva años en este su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a su negocio,tambien la socia continua con su negocio de cantina,la socia vende cerveza,gaseosas entre otros,la socia es una persona responsable con muchas ganas de continuar adelante por su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de pollos para su negocio.
texts.en:
La socia es Leonarda. She continues with her business of buying and selling chickens; she has been in this business for years and it has gone very well thanks to the effort that she puts into it. She also continues with her cantina business; she sells beer and sodas among other things.

The member is a responsible person with a strong desire to keep her family moving forward. She is requesting this loan for the purchase of chickens for her business.

loans.use: to purchase chickens for her business.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is 31 years old and has 4 children who are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Teresa has a fishing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 11 years. She requested a loan of 10,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase a fishing net and repair her fishing boat.

In the future, Teresa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase a fishing net and repair her fishing boat.

loans.name: Samwel

texts.en:
Samwel runs a butchery business in Olkalou town and has been in the business for the last 3 years. He is 27 years old and is married to Mary. They have three children aged 6, 4, and 2 years old.

This will be Samwel's second loan. He plans to buy more stock of sheep for slaughter and stock up his butchery business as well as make more profits with which he plans to pay school fees for his children.

In the future, Samwel hopes to grow his business and make more income, therefore becoming able to cater to his family's needs and improve their living standards.

loans.use: to buy more sheep for slaughter.

loans.name: Jamalbubu

texts.ru: Жамалбубу 53 года, замужем, имеет 2 детей. Жамалбубу работает учителем в школе села Талас и в  качестве дополнительного источника дохода для своей семьи занимается полеводством и животноводством, начав этот бизнес  в 1992 году с суммы в 25,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному  труду Жамалбубу в ее хозяйстве на сегодня имеется 1 корова с теленком, 10 голов мелкого рогатого скота, а также 1,60 га земли, где она выращивает зерновые культуры. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Жамалбубу обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота  - молодняка.  Доходы от кредита Жамалбубу планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего хозяйства.
texts.en:
Jamalbubu is 53 years old, married, and has two children.  Jamalbubu is a school teacher in the village of Talas and as a source of additional income for her family, she farms and raises livestock.  She began this business in 1992 with 25,000 som (KGS) and thanks to her hard work, today she has a cow and its calf, 10 head of sheep and goats, as well as 1.6 ha of land where she grows cereal crops.  

With the goal of further developing her business, Jamalbubu applied to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 80,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of young livestock.  Jamalbubu is planning to invest the income from her loan in the further development of her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Kholmurod

texts.ru: Холмурод житель района Хуросон. Ему 40 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Холмурод занимается животноводством. Этим видом деятельности он занимается двадцать лет. Кредит берет для закупа телят.
texts.en: Kholmurod is a resident of the Khuroson region.  He is 40 years old, married, and has three children.  Kholmurod raises cattle and he has been in this business for 20 years.  He is taking out a loan for the purchase of calves.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Aura Lyla

texts.es: La sra. Aura de 53 años de edad, es soltera. Se dedica al comercio de cosmeticos de distintas marcas desde hace 5 años. Solicita el cedito para realizar compra de mercaderia y surtir su inventario para ofecer mejor variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en: Aura, 53, is single.  She has had a business selling a variety of brands of cosmetics for 5 years.  She is requesting a loan to purchase merchandise to increase her inventory so that she can offer a greater variety of products to her customers.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Idimoh

texts.ru: Идимох проживает в районе Хуросон. Ей 38 лет. Она замужем. У нее пятеро детей. Идимох при доме имеет не большой участок земли, где выращивает овощи. Этим видом деятельности она занимается десять лет. Кредит берет для закупа семян зернобобовых культур и минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Idimoh lives in the Khuroson region.  She is 38 years old, married, and has five children.  Next to her house, Idimoh has a large plot of ground where she grows vegetables.  She has been in this business for 10 years.  She is taking out a loan for the purchase of legume seed and mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to purchase legume seed and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is 56 years old and has 10 children. She is married and has 2 children who are in school.

Lucia is in the agricultural business raising livestock in the Philippines. She requested a loan of 30,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase feed and other supplies for her livestock.

Lucia has been raising livestock for 5 years now and has borrowed 21 times in the past from NWTF to sustain this business.

In the future, Lucia would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed and other supplies for her livestock.

loans.name: Sitora

texts.ru: Ситора проживает в районе Хуросон. Ей 29 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Ее муж занимается бизнесом. Сама Ситора занимается растениеводством. Она в основном выращивает овщи. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Sitora lives in the Khuroson region.  She is 29 years old, married, and has three children.  Her husband is a businessman.  Sitora is a farmer and primarily grows vegetables.  She is taking out a loan to purchase mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Zarnigor

texts.ru: Зарнигор жительница района А. Джоми. Ей 26 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Ее муж находится в России. Она сама занимается растениеводством. В этой области она десять лет. Кредит берет для посева повторного урожая арбуза и дыни.
texts.en: Zarnigor lives in A. Dzhomi. She is 26 years old, married, and has three children. Her husband is in Russia. Zarnigor is a farmer, and has been doing this type of work for ten years. She is requesting a loan for sowing a new crop of watermelon and cantaloupes.

loans.use: To sow a new crop of watermelon and cantaloupes.

loans.name: Safarmahmad

texts.ru: Сафармахмад  проживает в районе Хуросон. Ему 54 года. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Его дети находятся за рубежом. Сам Сафармахмад занимается растениеводством. В этой области он 30 лет. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений и семян арбуза.
texts.en: Safarmahmad lives in the Khuroson region.  He is 54 years old, married, and has five children.  His children live abroad.  Safarmahmad is a farmer and has been doing this for 30 years. He is taking out a loan for the purchase of mineral fertilizers and watermelon seed.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers and watermelon seed

loans.name: Hue

texts.en: Hue was born in 1980. Her husband is an iron worker at Da Hoi. He gets 5,000,000 VND each month. Her sons are learning at primary school.  Hue has a beverages stall and earns 3,000,000 VND per month from it. She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2010. The last cycle, she borrowed 6,322,000 VND, which she repaid on time. In this loan cycle, she wants to borrow 7,630,000 VND to invest in her beverages stall. She hopes her business could then bring in enough money to pay her children’s education fee.

loans.use: to invest in her beverages stall and earn enough to pay her children’s education fee.

loans.name: Rajab

texts.ru: Рачаб проживает в районе Хуросон. Ему 48 лет. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Рачаб более пяти лет занимается животноводством. Он у себя дома разводит скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Кредит берет для закупа бычков и коровы.
texts.en: Rachab lives in Khuroson. He is 48 years old, married, and has four children. Rachab has been working in animal husbandry for more than five years. He does his own breeding at home, and then sells the livestock later on. He is requesting a loan to purchase bulls and cows.

loans.use: to purchase bulls and cows

loans.name: Muhtor

texts.en: Muhtor is a man who is in search of new deals and has a lot of good ideas. He has worked for 14 years in the food business. He prepares different kinds of meals with meat products. Muhtor's son helps him in his business and is a hard-working person, like his father. Muhtor has four children and a beautiful wife. Muhtor’s colleagues know him as a brave, kind, and clever man. They love him and always help him. Muhtor wants to develop his business and he is asking for a loan to buy livestock for meat.

loans.use: To buy livestock for meat.

loans.name: Arlinda

texts.en:
Arlinda is 39 years old, married, and has 2 children.  Her 2 children are in school.

Arlinda is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Arlinda requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs and ducks.

Arlinda has been raising livestock for 2 years now.  She has borrowed from NWTF 3 times in the past to sustain her business.

In the future, Arlinda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs and ducks.

loans.name: Jacquilyn

texts.en:
Jacquilyn is 34 years old, married, with 3 children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Her 3 children are in school.

Jacquilyn has a fish vending business in the Philippines.  She requested a PHP 30000 loan through NWTF to buy fish for her business.

Jacquilyn has been in this business for 8 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy fish for her business

loans.name: Asomidin

texts.en: Asomidin has been a business man for four years. He likes his work very much because it is very interesting. His business is keeping livestock. Asomidin works with pleasure and that is why his business develops every year. He has big and small livestock. This business helps to him to feed and keep his family. He has three children and a clever wife. His wife helps him in his business. Asomidin wants to develop his business further and he is asking for a loan to buy more livestock. He would be happy if you help him.

loans.use: To buy livestock for developing his business.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Julio, tiene 30 años de edad, vive en unión libre, tiene 2 hijos  y vive en una aldea rural del municipio de Morazán, Yoro.
La actividad económica es la agricultura, dedicado específicamente a la producción de granos básicos. El se inicio sus labores en la agricultura desde hace 15  años.  Dispone de un terreno que le fue heredado de sus padres.  El cual ha logrado hacer producir con mucho trabajo, empeño y dedicación. En la actualidad produce maíz y frijoles que le sirven para consumo y venta. Estos productos los vende en el mercado local a un buen precio,  Se siente motivado a seguir con su negocio productivo ya que considera que le generan buenas ganancias.
Solicita un préstamo  de 12000 para comprar fertilizante e insumos para aplicar a los cultivos y lograr tener una mejor producción y generar mejores ingresos.
 A futuro planea utilizar sus ganancias para poder comprar más tierra y heredarla a sus hijos y producir más.
texts.en:
Julio, age 30, is in a common-law marriage and has two children.  He lives in a rural village in the Morazán municipality in Yoro.

Julio is a farmer, and he produces basic grains.  He started his farm work 15 years ago.  He makes use of a piece of land that he inherited from his parents.  With great work, determination, and dedication he has managed to make the land productive.

He currently produces corn and beans for consumption and for sale.  He sells these products at the local market for a good price.  He is motivated to continue with his productive business because he feels that it generates good income for him.

He is requesting a loan for 12,000 lempiras to buy fertilizers and supplies to apply to his crops.  This way he will manage to have better production, and he will generate improved income.

In the future he plans to use his income to buy more land.  He plans on the land being his children’s inheritance, and he plans to produce more.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and supplies to apply to his crops.

loans.name: Danakhan

texts.ru: Данахан 61 год. В качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, Данахан  занимается разведением скота, начав этот бизнес  в 1990 году с суммы в 2,000 сом.   Благодаря упорному труду на сегодняшний  день  Данахан имеет в хозяйстве 5 коров с приплодом, 24 овец, и 1 лошадь,  что приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 15,000 сом. В целях развития своего бизнеса, Данахан обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дойной коровы в целях повышения доходов от продажи молока.  Доходы от кредита Данахан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Danakhan is 61 years old. As the only source of income for her family, Danakhan breeds livestock. She started her business in 1990 with 2,000 somi. Thanks to her hard work, Danakhan's business now has 5 cattle with offspring. 24 sheep, and 1 horse, and has a monthly profit of 15,000 somi. To develop her business further, Danakhan has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan in the amount of 50,000 somi (KGS) to purchase a dairy cow for increasing her income from the sale of milk. Danakhan plans to invest the proceeds from the loan into the future growth of her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Maral

texts.ru: Марал 32 года, замужем, воспитывает 2 детей. В качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, Марал занимается разведением скота, начав этот бизнес  в 1997 году с покупки коров.   Благодаря упорному труду на сегодняшний  день,  Марал имеет в хозяйстве 7 коров, 3 телки, 2 бычка и 4 теленка,  что приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 15,000 сом. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Марал обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дополнительных голов бычков.  Доходы от кредита Марал планирует частично вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства и часть использовать на ремонт своего дома.
texts.en:
Maral is 32 years old, married, and raising 2 children. As the main source of income for her family, Maral raises cattle, having started her business in 1997 with a purchase of several cows. Thanks to her hard work, presently her herd includes 7 cows, 3 heifers, 2 bulls and 4 calves, and earns her a monthly profit of 15,000 som.

In order to continue developing her business, Maral has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) to buy additional calves. She plans to invest a part of her profits from this loan into further expansion of her business, and to use the rest to repair her home.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Nazokat

texts.en: Nazokat has a difficult life. She lives alone, and that’s why she must to earn enough to meet all the needs of life. Nazokat is very kind and smart.  For 10 years she has been busy with her own business.  She sells women's clothing, and her customers are always satisfied.  She has a selling place in the local market and a lot of consumers.  Nazokat is known as a perfect business lady, so her business has developed year by year. Nazokat is asking a loan to buy goods for the new season. She waits your help.

loans.use: To buy goods for the new season

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es:
La socia se dedica al negocio de crianza de animales como pollos y cuyes,la socia los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en los diferentes mercados y sigue teniendo su combi que hace servicio de publico,por medios de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a su hijo,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de crianza de animales.La socia solicita el credito para comprar pollos y cuyes y tambien para comprar alimentos para los animales.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member [Nelly] works raising animals, such as chickens and guinea pigs. She fattens them and later sells them in different markets. She also still has a minibus with which she provides [transportation] services to the public. Through these two businesses, she helps her son get ahead. Her dream is to grow her animal-raising business. 

The member is requesting this loan to purchase chickens and guinea pigs and also to buy feed for the animals. She is happy about the loan and committed to making her loan payments.

loans.use: to purchase chickens, guinea pigs, and feed for the animals.

loans.name: Karina

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra Karina;La socia continua dedicandose al negocio de restaurante, ella lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a su negocio,la socia es una persona alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando por su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de insumos para su negocio como arroz y aceite.
texts.en: The communal bank member is Karina. She continues to make a living with her restaurant. She has worked in this business for years, and continues to do well thanks to the determination she has concerning her business. She is a happy and responsible person, with a strong desire to continue working to help her family. She has requested a loan to buy ingredients for her business, like rice and cooking oil.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her business, like cooking oil and rice.

loans.name: Shayirbubu

texts.ru: Шайырбубу 56 лет, замужем, имеет 4 детей. В качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, Шайырбубу занимается разведением скота, начав этот бизнес  в 1997 году со стартовой суммы в 35,000 сом (KGS).   Благодаря упорному труду на сегодняшний  день,  Шайырбубу имеет в хозяйстве 5 коров, 1 лошадь и 5 телят,  что приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 10,000 - 15,000 сом. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Шайырбубу обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку еще одной дойной коровы.  Доходы от кредита Шайырбубу планирует частично вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства и часть использовать на ремонт своего дома.
texts.en:
Shayirbubu is 56 years old, she is married and has 4 children. As the main source of income for her family, Shayirbubu raises cattle, having started her business in 1997 with an initial investment of 35,000 som (KGS). Thanks to her hard work, Shayirbubu's herd presently consists of 5 cows, 5 calves and 1 horse, and earns her 10,000 - 15,000 som per month.

In order to continue developing her business, Shayirbubu has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to purchase an additional dairy cow. She plans to invest a part of her profits from this loan into further expansion of her business, and to use the remainder to repair her home.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Nazirbegim

texts.ru: Назирбегим жительница района Хуросон. Она вдова. Ей 60 лет. У нее четверо детей. Она имеет среднее образование. Более двадцати трех лет Назирбегим занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. Она берет кредит для закупа семян и минеральных удобрений. Собрав урожай пшеницы она хочет посеять повторный урожай овощей.
texts.en:
Nazirbegim is a resident of the Khuroson region. She is 60 years old, a widow, and has four children. She has secondary education. 

Nazirbegim has been growing crops for over twenty years. She is taking this loan to purchase seeds and mineral fertilizers. After collecting her wheat harvest, Nazirbegim would like to plant a second round of vegetables.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Ahmarbek

texts.en:
Ahmarbek is a man of ideas. If you had a discussion with him you would be satisfied because he is a modern man with an interesting and kind character. He wants to discover new ways of doing business. His skills and experiences help him to perfect his business skills. During the last two years he has been busy selling food products. In the market he has his own pitch and has a lot of customers. Local people are very pleased with Ahmarbek’s work. 
Ahmarbek is married and has four children. He is requesting a loan to buy goods to widen his assortment.

loans.use: to buy goods to widen his assortment.

loans.name: Carmen Grimaneza

texts.es:
Carmen es una persona trabajadora, emprendedora y muy responsable en sus actividades ya que desea cumplir sus metas. Carmen vive con su esposo y sus hijos en Otavalo que se encuentra en la Provincia de Imbabura.

Carmen trabaja con su esposo en la crianza de animales (cerdos rosados), se dedican a este negocio desde hace mucho tiempo ya que sus padres les dejaron sus enseñanzas, además este negocio es la unica fuente de ingresos económicos que tienen por tal motivo tienen que ponerle mucho empeño; Carmen realiza un nuevo crédito en Fodemi el mismo que será invertido en la construcción de chancheras mas grandes ya que las actuales estan muy pequeñas, también comprará crías de cerdos rosados para seguir en el negocio de crianza y venta.

Carmen sueña en tener una mediana empresa de distribución de cerdos.
texts.en:
Carmen is a hard working entrepreneur, and is very responsible in her activities because she wants to reach her goals. She lives with her husband and their children in Otavalo, which is located in the province of Imbabura. 

Carmen works alongside her husband, raising animals, specifically pink pigs. She has worked in this business for quite some time, since she was taught by her parents, and it is her only source of income which is why it is important she works with determination. She has requested a new loan through Fodemi, which she will invest in the construction of new, bigger pig pens, since the pens they currently have are very small. She will also buy litters of pink piglets to continue raising and selling pigs. 

Carmen dreams of having a medium sized pig distribution business.

loans.use: to build bigger pig pens, because those that she has are small, and to buy litters of pink piglets.

loans.name: Augusto Manuel

texts.es:
El Señor Augusto es habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe, junto a su esposa han sacado a sus hijos adelante y an hido poco a poco construyendo su sueño, su casa propia, su espasa le apoya en los gastos del hogar ya que ella tiene un negocito, vende ropa de segunda, con este Financiamiento que Afodenic le ha otorgado comprara materiales para construir como: Cemento, Zinc, Perlines y pagara la mano de obra asi ellos tendran un techo digno para criar a sus hijos.
Agradece a Afodenic quien con Fondos Kivas le han brindado la confianza.
texts.en: Augusto lives in the Ticuantepe municipality. Together with his wife they have been pulling through to support their children and little by little they have been building their dream, to have a house if their own. His wife helps with the household expenses since she has a small store; she sells used clothes. With the loan from Afodenic he will buy construction materials such as, cement, metal sheets and purlins and he will pay for the construction workers, so they will be able to have a decent home to raise their kids in. He is thankful to Afodenic, which together with Kiva, has trusted him.

loans.use: to buy construction materials: cement, metal sheets and purlins

loans.name: Nyevu

texts.en:
Nyevu is married and has three children. She dreams of becoming a successful, professionally fulfilled woman. Her children are her motivation to work persistently every day to create conditions that will lead to better well-being for them. Nyevu works at two activities. On the one hand she sells milk and on the other she farms green vegetables to sell. She learned both activities in 2011 and then started to use her skills in these areas to earn income. Her customers are neighbours, friends, family members and people referred by current customers. The sale of milk takes place door to door. Nyevu's major challenge is the high cost of transportation.
Nyevu's goal is to become a wholesale supplier of milk and to expand her profit margin. She wants to invest to attract more customers but her working capital is her greatest challenge to reaching this dream. This is the reason why she is requesting a Kiva loan, which will be her first financing from Kiva partner Yehu Microfinance Trust. Nyevu will use the loan to buy packets of milk and farm supplies for her farm in order to continue to strengthen her two income-producing businesses and improve her family’s future.

loans.use: to buy packets of milk and farm supplies.

loans.name: Akbarjon

texts.en: Akbarjon is a good family man, who has two children and a helpful wife. He has a truck and works in two jobs, one of them transporting passengers and another transporting goods. He works from morning to night for his family in order to give them good living conditions. During his journeys he often thinks about them and their environment. Now he is asking for a loan to purchase building materials for building and repairing his house in order to improve its condition. Akbarjon hopes you are able to support him.

loans.use: to purchase building materials in order to build and repair his house.

loans.name: Amigos De Planes Group

texts.es:
María Santos tiene 39 años de edad, es casada, tiene 2 hijos y vive con ellos y su esposo en una aldea que pertenece al municipio de Intibucá.
ella siempre ha trabajado en la agricultura ya tiene más de 15 años de realizar sus propios cultivos junto a su esposo, ya que el lugar donde viven es zona agrícola y apta para estos cultivos. Cultiva papa, maíz y frijoles de temporada. Esta producción la vende en el mercado local. Doña María Santos, ha solicitado cuatro préstamos anteriormente con los cuales ha podido darle buen mantenimiento a los cultivos. Ahora solicita un quinto préstamo para comprar la semilla de papa y abonos, y para pagar trabajadores que le ayudan en el cultivo de papa, y poder darle una buena asistencia para sacar mejores cosechas. Su meta es incrementar la producción para obtener mejores ingresos para su familia.
Ella pertenece al grupo solidario llamado Amigos de planes, que está formado por 6 integrantes. En la foto se identifican de la siguiente manera: a la izquierda esta don Juan, seguido por Justino, luego María Santiago, le sigue María Santos, después Francisco y a la derecha esta Nicomedes. Todos se dedican a la agricultura en la zona y viven en la misma comunidad. El préstamo grupal suma Lps.45,500.00.
texts.en:
María Santos, age 39, is married and has two children.  She lives with them and her husband in a village in the Intibucá municipality.

She has always worked in agriculture.  Together with her husband she has had her own crops for over 15 years.  The place where they live is an agricultural zone, and it is suitable for their crops.  She grows potatoes, corn, and seasonal beans.  She sells this production at the local market.

María Santos has requested four previous loans, which she was able to use to provide her crops with good maintenance.  

She is now requesting her fifth loan.  She will use the loan to buy potato seeds and fertilizers, to pay workers who help them with the potato crop, and to be able to provide the crops with good care in order to get better harvests.  Her goal is to increase the production in order to get better income for her family.

She belongs to the Amigos de Planes communal bank, which is comprised of six members.  This is how to identify the people in the photo:  Juan is to the left followed by Justino, then María Santiago followed by María Santos, after her is Francisco, and Nicomedes is to the right.  They all devote themselves to agriculture in the area, and they live in the same community.  The group loan is for the amount of 45,500 lempiras.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds, natural and foliar fertilizers, and to pay for the labor to help with the crops.

loans.name: Rigoberto Saul

texts.es:
Rigoberto es una persona de 26 años, que se caracteriza por ser amable, culto, responsable y muy trabajador. Rigoberto vive con sus padres en Otavalo que se encuentra en la Provincia de Imbabura.

Rigoberto trabaja con sus hermanos en la crianza y venta de cerdos rosados, debido a que su economía no es buena deciden incrementar su negocio con más animales, es por eso que realiza un crédito en Fodemi el mismo que va a ser invertido en la compra de cerdos hembras para reproducción y también comprando vacas lecheras para la producción y venta de leche. Esta inversión ayudará a Rigoberto y a su familia a mejorar su calidad de vida y sustentando los gastos de estudios de sus hermanos.

Rigoberto sueña en tener una empresa de procesamiento de carne para poder tener buenos ingresos y ayudar económicamente a su familia y con trabajo a las personas que mas lo necesiten.
texts.en:
Rigoberto is a 26-year-old who characterizes himself as friendly, educated, responsible, and very hardworking. Rigoberto lives with his parents in Otavalo, which is located in Imbabura Province. 

Rigoberto works with his siblings raising and selling pink pigs. Since the economy isn't good, they decided to boost their business with more animals. For this reason he is getting a loan from Fodemi, which will be invested in the purchase of female pigs for breeding. The loan will also be used to buy dairy cows for the production and sale of milk. This investment will help Rigoberto and his family improve their quality of life and will support his siblings' education expenses. 

Rigoberto dreams of having a meat processing business to make a good living and to help his family financially, and to help with employment for the people who need it most.

loans.use: to purchase female pigs for breeding and to purchase cows for business in milk production.

loans.name: Delfina

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra Delfina;La socia es profesora del nivel primario ,ella trabaja de lunes a viernes durante el dia ,la socia lleva años ejerciendo su carrera la cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia,la socia es una persona alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando por su familia.
La socia solicita el prestamo para la compra de insumos para su hogar como arroz.
texts.en: The communal bank member is Delfina. She is an elementary school teacher. She works Monday through Friday during the day. She has worked in her field for years, which she is doing well in, thanks to the determination she works with each day. She is a happy and responsible person with a strong desire to continue working to help her family. She has requested a loan to buy supplies for her home, like rice.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her home, like rice.

loans.name: Zebokhon

texts.en:
Zebokhon has a friendly family. She has three children and a lovely husband. Zebokhon and her husband want to live in a comfortable house with their children. Zebokhon has her own business in animal sales. She loves animals very much, which is why she chose this kind of business. She cares for her livestock very well and she has many customers in the local market. 
Zebokhon wants to repair her house but her income is not sufficient for it. She is requesting a loan to buy building materials.

loans.use: to buy building materials for repairing her house.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
La Sra. María Elena comenta que ha tenido durante mucho tiempo el problema de la humedad por el agua en tiempo de lluvia, por una pared que tiene entre los cuartos de su vivienda ya que es de madera y con la construcción de la pared de block que piensa hacer ya no tendrá más ese problema, ya no tendrá que tener el trapeador siempre cerca cuando llueve.
La Sra. Elena es originaria del estado de Nuevo León pero tiene radicando en Nuevo Laredo desde hace más 40 años. Sus ingresos son por la venta de ropa usada, pero más que nada por el apoyo semanal que le dan sus 5 hijos.
texts.en:
María Elena told us that for a long time she has had the problem of having humidity in her home during rainy season, which is the result of a wooden wall that is between two rooms in her house.
