He is a cadet in the army and is asking for financial support to make improvements to his home such as making internal room divisions, since due to a lack of capital he has not been able to do this.  At the moment, he is asking for financing in order to buy construction materials such as cinder blocks, cement, lime, iron, corrugated metal sheeting, nails, wire, decorative stones, etc.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as:  cinder blocks, cement, lime, iron, corrugated metal sheeting, nails, wire, decorative stones, etc.

loans.name: Jose Guillermo

texts.es: Jose Guillermo de  51 años de edad de la localidad de chinandega , asalariado, con tres hijos mayores de edad, esta solicitando el  el financiamiento para hacerle mejoras a su casa de habitacion  que consisten en levantar la pared perimetral de costado sur de la vivienda , ya que desde que adquirio la casa ha querido hacerle mejoras pero por falta de dinero no lo habia podido realizar, en la actualidad gracia la apoyo que fundacion le ha brindado es que  realizara  dicha mejorar para el bienestar de su familia.del fiannanciamiento comprar material de construccion como: bloques, cal, cementro, arena, hierro, alambre, clavios. Entre otros.
texts.en: Jose Guillermo, 51, lives in Chinandega.  He is employed, has three adult children, and is requesting a loan to make some improvements on his house.  This will be to put up a wall on the south side of his house.  Since he bought the house he has wanted to fix it up but he hasn't been able to do it for lack of money.  Thanks to the support the foundation has offered him he will be able to make this improvement for the benefit of his family.  He will use the loan to buy construction materials such as cement blocks, lime, cement, sand, iron, wire, nails, etc.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as cement blocks, lime, cement, sand, iron, wire, nails, etc.

loans.name: Chreb's Group

texts.en:
Chreb is 40 years old and has three children, all of whom are staying with the family. To make a living and to support her children's school fees, Chreb and her husband have been farming rice and planting cassava for more than ten years. During their spare time from the farm, they work for others to make additional income for the family. Chreb has received two loans from VisionFund and both loans have been repaid. 

Chreb is now leading a group of two members to apply for another loan. As a leader, she will use her portion to spend on farmland preparation  for her rice farm and cassava plantation and the rest of the money will be spent on food for the family. Chreb hopes this loan will enable her to have higher-yielding crops, and that as a result more money will be made and her family can live in a better condition.

loans.use: To prepare the land for her rice farm and cassava plantation

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Ridwan

texts.en:
Ridwan is a 20-year-old single man. He is the second child in his family and has 2 brothers. The oldest brother is married and the youngest brother is still at school.  Ridwan left senior high school 4 years ago to assist his father in cultivating their farm. On the farm they plant vegetables such as green beans, cabbage, mustard greens, tomatoes, water spinach etc. The plants thrive on the farm. Every two months Ridwan is able to harvest the plants and sell them to customers at the local market.  

Ridwan plans to grow more vegetables and therefore requested a loan of IDR 10,000,000 from TLM to buy vegetable seedlings and fertilizer. Ridwan is hoping that the business will improve and bring a good result for himself and also his beloved family.

loans.use: to buy vegetable seedlings and fertilizer.

loans.name: Hilaria Del Carmen

texts.es: Hilaria del Carmen de cincuenta y un años de edad , casada con tres hijos mayores de edad, tiene por actividad economica un taller de costura desde hace 26 años que inicio con dicha herramienta de trabajo, ya que es un oficio que a ella le gusta mucho , ademas es una forma de ganarce la vida honradamente y asi poder aporta dinero para su hogar  ella ha tenido prestamos con Leon 2000 desde hace vario años el cual ha demostrado ser responsable, trabajadora de buenas costumbres, el la actualidad esta solicitando el financiamiento para la compra de materia prima como. Telas, forros botones, ziper, agujas, cedinas, aceite de maquina entre otros.
texts.en: Hilaria del Carmen is 51 years old, married and has three adult children. She has worked as a seamstress for some 26 years and enjoys her work very much and as a bonus she has a way to earn an honest living that allows her to provide money to sustain her home. Hilaria del Carmen has had loans with Leon 2000 for several years and she has shown that she is a responsible and hard worker with good habits. At present, she needs the loan to buy materials for her work like fabrics, lining, buttons, zippers, needles, oil for her sewing machine and other items.

loans.use: buy materials like fabrics, lining, buttons, zippers, needles, oil for her sewing machine and other items.

loans.name: Nina

texts.en:
Nina is a 39-year-old widow who lives with her only son, Alvin (11). He is studying in the 5th grade of elementary school. Nina runs a kiosk business to cover the household needs and Alvin's educational needs. 

At the moment, Nina is seeking additional business capital as she has used part of her business capital to cover Alvin’s educational expenses. She then went to the TLM office to apply for a loan of IDR 5,000,000. The loan would enable her to add more kiosk stocks, for example to cover the nine daily basic needs as well as snacks, detergent, cigarettes, shampoo, etc. Nina is putting her hope on the loan assistance to help her improve her business.

loans.use: to add more stocks such as snacks, detergent, cigarettes and shampoo

loans.name: Rehema

texts.en:
Rehema is 60 years old, a farmer in Kilifi. She is married and supports five people. She grows and sells farm produce. She has been doing farming for the past seven years, and she is doing great.

This marks her fifth business loan from KADET LTD to finance her farming. She plans to purchase insecticides and farming equipment. She will use the anticipated profits to expand her farm. She hopes to become self sufficient.

loans.use: to purchase insecticides and farming equipment

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more stock such as tea leaves, salt and maize flour, and also to get more milk and milk storage equipment.

loans.name: Ten

texts.en:
Ten, age 41, is a hard-working woman who has a strong determination to move forward in life. She is a farmer who is eager to achieve her goals and experience a good quality of life. 

She is married to Por, 44, her husband and also her business partner. They help each other in managing their farming business to raise their two school-aged children and provide them a good education.

She wants to expand her business, but unfortunately she suffers from financial constraints. This is why she decided to request a loan of KHR 2,000,000 to supplement her capital to purchase a piece of land to increase her rice production. 

She is very sure that this loan will allow her to be successful in her business and make a better future for the family.

loans.use: to purchase an extra piece of land to increase her rice production.

loans.name: Evelio Gregorio

texts.es: Evelio Gregorio,  de treinta y siete año de edad, casado con 5 años de edad,  tiene por actividada economica la produccion y comercialziacion de semilla de jicaro.tiene por experiencia  12 años de experiencia, el negocio lo inico con esfuerzo propio cuando se traslado a vivir a la zona , en la actualidad esta solicitando la financiamiento para la compra de semilla de jicaro para sembra y comercializarla.
texts.en: Evelio Gregorio is 37 years old, and has been married for 5 years. He works cultivating and selling Jicaro seeds. He has 12 years of experience in his business which he started on his own when he moved to the area. Evelio Gregorio needs the loan to buy Jicaro seeds to sow and sell.

loans.use: buy Jicaro seeds to sow and sell.

loans.name: Rajabali

texts.ru: Рачабали трудолюбивый и добрый семьянин, на воспитании имеет двух умных детей. Более 10 лет он занимается купле- продажей строительных материалов, такие как цемент и известь. В бизнесе занимается один и день за днем работает усердно, чтобы содержать свою семью в хороших условиях и хочет дать детям хорошее образование. Рачабали хотел бы получить займ для покупки стройматериалов с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Rajabali is a kind and hardworking family man with two bright children.  He has had a business selling construction materials such as cement and lime for over 10 years. He runs the business alone; day after day working diligently to provide his family with good living conditions. He also wants to give his children good educations. Rajabali would like a loan to buy construction materials in order to expand his business. He hopes for your help and goodwill.

loans.use: To purchase building materials in order to expand his business

loans.name: Adriana

texts.en:
Adriana, 43, is married and has 3 children.  Ardy, 16, her eldest child, is attending the 3rd grade of junior high school; Ona, 13, is attending the 2nd grade of junior high school, and Tomi, 8, is attending the 2nd grade of elementary school.

Adriana is in the business of renting out rooms.  She has been running the business for several years.  At this point she has 11 rooms to lease out. All her rooms are now being occupied by university students. Adriana plans to provide better facilities for her rentals by building 2 more bathrooms. Therefore, she requested a loan of IDR 4,500,000 from TLM to be spent on bricks and cement. She hopes that the new bathrooms will make her customers feel more comfortable in staying there.

loans.use: to buy bricks and cement to improve her rental property

loans.name: Paulina

texts.en:
This is Paulina, 55, a resident of Taguig City, Philippines. She is married and a mother to her child. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.  

Paulina maintains a direct selling business. She sells clothing, footwear, undergarments, cosmetics, and other products through the popular direct selling brands like Avon, Fuller Life, Natasha, Boardwalk, Marikina Shoe Exchange, and other direct selling brands. A customer's order is bought in cash by the dealer and then given to the customer with a one-month-to-pay credit. Dealers' prices are lower than those in the catalog, and these are the profits that dealers are investing on as their income. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of Php 2,000 in sales every week.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a Php 25,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy orders for her customers. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 
 
Paulina hopes to grow her business in the coming years and dreams of having a good life for her family. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional supplies and merchandise products needed in her business.

loans.name: Erick

texts.es: Erick, tiene la edad  de 30 años, está casado,  vive con su esposa y dos hijos actualmente. El con el crédito pretende comprar una máquina para limpiar la maleza del café y además tiene pensado comprar una bomba de motor para fumigar el café de una forma mas ágil y con un mejor efecto y rendimiento. El tiene pensado comprar  estas maquinas para poder asistir el café de una mejor forma y poder generar más ganancias  y obtener una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica para él y su familia. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Erick is 30 years old, is married and lives with his wife and two children. With the loan he will buy a machine to clear out the weeds that are around his coffee crops and buy a motor pump to fumigate the coffee much faster and efficiently. He thinks that buying these machines will help him have better coffee which will result in more earnings, a better quality of life and economic stability for him and his family. This is his first loan from FUDECOSUR. Erick has not had any other loans in state banks, but FUDECOSUR has given him a loan with greater ease and lower interest rates.

loans.use: buy a machine to clear out weeds and a motor pump to fumigate his coffee crops.

loans.name: Neang's Group

texts.en:
Neang is 31 years old and married. She has three sons, all of whom are students. She has been making Khmer snacks for sale to support her family. 

Neang's group consists of two members. Each is receiving their second loan from VisionFund after their first loans had been completely paid. 

As the leader, Neang used her portion to expand her business so as to make more Khmer snacks for sale. Through this loan, Neang hopes to make more income by selling the food she makes so that she has enough money for her children's school fees.

loans.use: to make Khmer snacks for sale and expand her business.

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Kror Lanh district

loans.name: Bayasgalan

texts.en: Bayasgalan is 45 years old and runs a casual clothes stall in the bazaar. She has been running her business for 3 years and has gained valuable experience in it. She lives with her son in the ger district, an area of Darkhan with no running water, minimal roads and spotty electricity.  Darkhan is the second largest city in Mongolia. Her son is a student and he has an old car. Sometimes he uses it to run a taxi service to help his mother. Bayasgalan is a really hardworking woman, and it's her dream that her son gets a good education. This time she is requesting a loan to buy more casual clothes to increase her inventory and her sales volume.   She thinks that increase is very important to her business.  During the summer she has had good sales every year.

loans.use: To buy more casual clothes to increase her sales volume.

loans.name: Jader Jose

texts.es: El señor Jader de 33 años de edad es un humilde agricultor de la ciudad de Teustepe se dedica a la siembra de maíz, frijol y trigo, casado, padre de 4 hijos que están a su cargo,   actualmente solo dos de sus hijos estudian su primaria en una escuela de la comunidad. El inicio su actividad desde muy joven ayudándole a sus padres, pero desde hace trece años  decidió independizarse, empezó a trabajar  por si solo, Jader además de cultivar granos básicos también se dedica a la producción de leche que le generan  sus vacas las cuales ha venido comprando de las ganancias que saca de la cosecha, en su negocio paga mano de obra debido a que no tiene apoyo de nadie, sus productos los comercializa en la misma comunidad para evitar gastos de transporte, su expectativa es mantener su producción de leche activa. Solicita el crédito para comprar animales (vacas) con el objetivo de obtener otros ingresos, sus planes futuros es cancelar el crédito con los ingresos que le genere  la producción de leche y seguir  comprando mas animales (vacas), su meta próxima es realizar la siembra de maíz, frijol y trigo de este año para poder asegurar la alimentación de la familia y poder salir adelante.
texts.en: Mr. Jader is 33 years old and is a humble farmer from the city of Teustepe. He works sowing corn, beans and wheat. Mr. Jader is married and is a father to 4 children who are under his care and at present, only two of his children attend a primary school in the area. He started his job from a very young age by helping his parents but over 13 years ago he decided to work on his own. Besides sowing basic grains, he also sells milk that he gets from his cows, which he has been buying with his crop earnings. He has to pay for labor since he does not have the support of anyone and his products are sold in the area to avoid transportation expenses. He wants to keep his milk business as well which is why Mr. Jader needs the loan to buy animals (cows) to have another source of income. He plans to pay his debt with the profits from his milk production and to keep buying more animals (cows). This year, his next goal is to have his corn, bean and wheat harvests so that he can keep securing his family’s daily bread and get ahead in life.

loans.use: buy cows.

loans.name: Ziyodagul

texts.ru: Зиёдагул проживает в районе Хуросон. Ей 50 лет. Она замужем. У нее пятеро детей. Ее муж и сын находятся в Российской Федерации. Сама Зиёдагул зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. Она берет кредит для закупа телят.
texts.en: Ziyodagul lives in the Khuroson District. She is 50 years old, married, and has five children. Her husband and son are in Russia. Ziyodagul earns a living by raising cattle. She is requesting a loan to buy calves.

loans.use: To buy calves

loans.name: Zebi

texts.ru: Зеби пожилая женщина около 60 лет.Она пенсионерка, но она постоянно в движении и в поиске новой работы.У неё большая семья и она старается привлечь всех членов семьи к какой-нибудь работе.Сама Зеби работает охранником в железнодорожной станции, а дома в свободное время вырвщивает скот.У неё много помощников,внуки и невестки.Невестки дома занимаются вышивкой женских тканей, бисером.Также они шьют женские вещи на продажу и Зеби продает эти вещи в сельской местности.Сыновья тоже работают.Зеби постоянная клиентка Арванда и уже несколько раз брала кредит на разные цели.Очередной кредит она хочет использовать на покупку коровы или бычка,хочет откормив его продать по выгодной цене на рынке.
texts.en:
Zebi is an elderly woman of 60. She is a pensioner, but is constantly on the move and in search of a new occupation. She has a large family tries to involve all family members in some sort of work. Zebi works as a security guard at a train station, and in her free time raises cattle at home. She has many helpers - grandchildren and daughters-in-law. Zebi's daughters-in-law work at home and embroider fabrics for women's clothing with beads. They also sew women's clothing, which Zebi then sells in the countryside. Her sons are also employed.

Zebi is a regular client of MDO Arvand, LLC and has already taken several loans for various purposes. She wants to take a new loan to purchase a cow or bull, fatten it, and then resell it at a profit.

loans.use: to buy a bull or cow for fattening and resale

loans.name: Baroatjon

texts.ru: Бароатчон-женщина работающая в бюджетной корпорации-она служащая в городском архиве.Имеет большой опыт работы и стаж в этой организации.Она замужем и мать троих детей.Её муж зарабатывает  частными работами и у него нестабильный доход.Известно,что большинство таджикских мужчин уезжают на заработки  в Россию и муж Бароатчон также по приглашению своих знакомых хочет уехать на заработки.Там ему обещали определенную работу и место жительство.Поэтому они решили получить кредит на покупку авиабилета для мужа и Бароатчон надеется что её муж быстро найдет себе приличную работу и она расплатится с кредитом.
texts.en: Baroatjon works in the public sector - she is an employee of the city archives. She has extensive experience in this line of work. Baroatjon is married and has three children. Her husband is self-employed and does not have a stable income. Most Tajik men leave to find work in Russia, and Baroatjon's husband has been invited by his acquaintances to do the same. He has been promised a job and accommodation there. For this reason, Baroatjon and her husband have decided to take a loan to purchase an airline ticket for him. Baroatjon hopes that her husband will quickly find a good job and she will be able to pay off her loan.

loans.use: to buy an airline ticket so that her husband can travel to Russia to find work

loans.name: Hindra Jesus

texts.es:
Hindra es un joven muy trabajador tiene 27 años y vive al lado de su esposa quien lo apoya mucho en todo lo que él hace y sobre todo es su mano derecha, Hindra vive en el ciudad de Ica, ciudad que se caracteriza por su clima cálido, por su agricultura en especial el cultivo de algodón, uva, esparrago, paprika entre otros, encontramos también a uno de sus atractivos turísticos mas visitados el cual es la linda “Laguna de Huacachina”, la cual se encuentra ubicada en medio de fabulosas dunas. Hindra trabaja muy duro pero cuando tiene un tiempito líbrele gusta mucho comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con Pollo”. Debido a los pocos recursos económicos de sus padres el tuvo que aprender a trabajar para poder ayudar en su hogar, por ello el solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Mecánica automotriz.

Día a día Hindra trabaja en su negocio como chofer de mototaxi, es su único medio de trabajo, es por ello que se esfuerza muy duro para poder tener un buen día y llevar el dinero necesario para solventar los gastos de su hogar; el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy responsable cuando conduce y sobre todo es muy carismático con los clientes.

Hindra está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar un mantenimiento general a su vehículo de trabajo así mismo podrá reforzar las puertas de su mototaxi, refaccionar el techo entre otros arreglos mas, así de esta manera el podrá tener un vehículo más seguro para el transporte de los clientes y de esta manera tener un mejor vehículo para trabajar y poder mejorar sus ingresos , lo que le permitirá seguir en busca de cumplir su más grande sueño:” Tener una casa propia y un auto”.
texts.en:
Hindra is a young worker, he is 27 years old and lives with his wife who supports him in everything that he does but above all she is his right hand. Hindra lives in the city of Ica, a city that is characterized by its warm climate, its agriculture, especially the cotton crops, grapes, asparagus, paprika and other plants. There are also tourist attractions that are frequently visited like the beautiful “Huacahina Lagoon” it is located in the center of fabulous dunes. Hindra works very hard but when he has free time he enjoys eating one of his favorite dishes, Chicken with Rice. Due to a lack of his family’s resources he had to lean to work to help maintain his home, this is why he only has a high school education but he would have liked to studied automotive mechanics. 

Day to day, Hindra works in his business as a chauffeur in a motorcycle taxi, it is his only source of work which is why he tries very hard to have a good day and earn enough to meet his household expense. He believes he does well in his job because he is very responsible when he drives but above all he is very charismatic to his customers.

Hindra is very grateful to the Kiva lenders since thanks to your help he will be able to give general maintenance to his work vehicle as well as strengthen the doors of his motorcycle taxi, repair the roof and make other upkeeps. This will allow him to have a safer vehicle to transport his customers, have a better vehicle to work and improve his income which will help him follow through with his greater dream “own my own home and a car.”

loans.use: give general maintenance to his work vehicle by strengthening the doors, repair the roof and make other upkeeps.

loans.name: Cesar Hernan

texts.es:
CESAR HERNAN tiene 32 años es soltero, vive con su madre y padre en la ciudad de Montalvo Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC 3 cruces esta ventanilla se dedican al cultivo de cacao, naranja y maíz.

Solicita el crédito para comprar urea, líquido para la maleza, insecticidas para los cultivos. 

Con el apoyo del crédito podría comprar los fertilizantes. Realiza sus compras y ventas cada semana en la ciudad de Montalvo.

El sueño del señor es mejorar la situación económica. El desafío al que se presenta es tener un negocio propio.
En su tiempo libre se dedica a pasear.
texts.en:
Cesar Hernan is 32 years old. He is single. He lives with his mother and father in the city of Montalvo in the province of Los Rios.

He is a member of the communal bank "Tres Cruces" (three crosses), which works with farmers who grow cocoa, oranges, and corn.

He is applying for the loan to buy urea, liquid for weeds, and insecticides for his crops.

With the help of the loan he will be able to buy fertilizers. He makes his purchases and sales every week in the city of Montalvo.

This man's dream is to improve his economic situation. His challenge is to have his own business. In his free time he likes to go for walks.

loans.use: to buy urea, liquid for weeds, and insecrticides for his crops.

loans.name: Mahmadnaim

texts.ru: Махмаднаим проживает в в районе Хуросон. Ему 51 год. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Он занимается растениеводством. Этим видом деятельности занимается 21 год. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Mahmadnaim lives in the Khuroson District. He is 51 years old, married, and has four children. He farms crops, as he has for the past 21 years. He is requesting a loan to buy mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: Buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Mohmokul

texts.ru: Мохмокул житель района Хуросон. Ему 58 лет. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам он занимается растениеводством. Этим видом деятельности занимается тридцать лет. Кредит берет для посева овощей.
texts.en: Mohmokul lives in Khuroson District. He is 58 years old, married, and has five children. His wife is a homemaker. He is a farmer, and has been growing crops for thirty years. He is requesting a loan in order to sow vegetables.

loans.use: Buy seeds

loans.name: Edelmira De Los Angeles

texts.es: Edelmira  de los angeles de 25 años de edad  soltera con tres hijos menores de edad, tiene por actividad la venta de mercaderia en general , desde hace nueve años, el cual esta ubica de forma ambulante, en la actualidadad ha logrado crecer en el mercado y con su cliente gracias a que siempre esta abastenciendo con mercaderia nueva y de acuerdo a la temporado, ella esta solicitando el financiamiento para invertir en capital de trabajo como: camisa de hombre, mujer, chinelas, zapatos, pantalones, tuallas, sabanas, entre otros.
texts.en: Edelmira de Los Angeles is 25 years old, is single and has three underage children. She has worked for nine years selling general merchandize as a street vendor. At present, she has been able to grow in the market with her customers since she keeps her merchandize well stocked and new according to the seasons. Edelmira needs the loan to buy work capital like men’s and women’s shirts, slippers, pants, towels, sheets and other items.

loans.use: buy work capital like men’s and women’s shirts, slippers, pants, towels, sheets and other items.

loans.name: Saidullo

texts.ru: Сайдулло-стремиться улучшить свою жизнь,работая сразу на двух местах.Он до обеда продает предметы первой необходимости на центральном рынке.У него есть торговая точка в многолюдном месте и его товар имеет большой спрос.На второй половине дня он подрабатывает на лепешечном цехе.Старается чтобы его семья не отставала от других и приучает своих детей тоже работать в свободное время.Его семья не очень большая, но его жена не работает,она домахозяйка,  воспитывает детей и присматривает за хозяйством.Он первый раз обратился в нашу организацию. Хочет расширить свой ассортимент, чтобы клиентов заинтересовать. Надеется сотрудничать с нашей организацией и заранее благодарит нас за поддержку.
texts.en: Saidullo is seeking to improve his life by working two jobs at once. Before lunch he sells essential goods at the central market. He has a market stall in a busy place and has high demand for his goods. For the second half of the day he works in a bakery. He is trying to keep his family from falling behind others, and teaches his children to work in their free time as well. His family is not large, but his wife doesn't work; she is a homemaker, raising the children and looking after their home.  This is the first time he is turning to our organization. He wants to expand his inventory in order to attract customer interest. He is hoping to work with our organization and thanks us in advance for the support.

loans.use: expand his inventory

loans.name: Tojiniso

texts.ru: Точинисо-молодая вдова, ей 41 год и у неё трое детей.Недавно к большому сожалению у неё скончался муж от болезни и она теперь воспитывает детей одна.Её дети еще не имеют личной жизни и она выдает старшую дочку замуж.Для этого по национальному обряду она должна много готовиться и сделать большие покупки.Как известно на заработную плату всего этого не  купить и она берет на эти расходы кредит.Сейчас ей в семейном бюджете помогают родственники и сын.Точинисо получает второй кредит на свои нужды и считает  наши условия очень выгодными.Благодарит за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Tojiniso has recently become a widow. She is 41 years old and has three children. Sadly, her husband died a short time ago due to an illness, and now she raises their children alone. The children still live at home, but Tojiniso is planning a wedding for her oldest daughter. Traditions dictate that she undertake extensive preparations and make large purchases. Not surprisingly, her salary is not sufficient to buy everything, and so she is taking this loan to cover her expenses.

At this time, Tojiniso's son and other relatives contribute to the family's budget. This is Tojiniso's second personal loan, and she is happy with the conditions of borrowing from MDO Arvand, LLC. She is grateful fo the financial support.

loans.use: to purchase dowry and hold a wedding for her oldest daughter

loans.name: Juana Bautista

texts.es: Juana Bautista de 49 años de edad, soltera con tres hijos mayores de edad, tiene por actividad economica la venta de mercaderia en general a la cual se dedica desde hace 18 años , incio con este negocio por la necesidad de tener una herramienta de trabajo para tener un medio de vida rentable para la mantenencion de sus hijos,  ella ofrece su mercaderia de manera ambulante, en la actualidad ha podido cumplir sueños y metas personales como  es termina de cosntruir mi casa de habitacion, el financiamiento lo esta solicitando para invertir en la compra mercaderia como: cosmeticos, prenda de plata, ropa de niño, ropa de adultos , camisas, camisetas, ropa interior, sabanas, tuallas, entre otros.
texts.en: Juana Bautista is 49 years old. She is single, with three adult children. Her business is selling general merchandise, and she has done this for 18 years. She began this business out of the necessity to have a source of employment in order to have a profitable livelihood to support her children. She offers her merchandise as a street vendor. Now she has been able to accomplish her dreams and personal goals, such as finishing the construction of her home. The financing that she is applying for will be invested in the purchase of merchandise such as cosmetics, silver jewelry, children's clothing, adults' clothing, shirts, t-shirts, underwear, sheets, and towels, among other items.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as cosmetics, silver jewelry, children's clothing, adult's clothing, shirts, t-shirts, underwear, sheets, and towels, among other items.

loans.name: Jael

texts.es: Jael de 36 años este emprendedor tiene por actividad economica la venta de meracaderia en general, el cual lo tiene de forma ambulante tiene cuatro años de tener el negocio , el cual inico este negocio como una forma de subsistencia para mi familia en la actualidad le ha ido bien gracia al apoyo que fundacion leon 2000 le ha brindado con los financiamientos ,por lo cual ha podido cumplir metas y objectivo personales como es tener una vivienda propia., esta solicitando el prestamos para invertir en la compra de cosmeticos, zapatos, y ropa en general.
texts.en: Jael is 36 years old she is an enterprising woman and has worked for 4 years selling general merchandize as a street vendor. She began her work as a way to have a source of income for her family and has done well thanks to the support from the Leon 2000 foundation who gave her financing. She has been able to meet her goals and personal objectives like having her own home. Jael needs the loan to buy merchandize like makeup, shoes and clothing.

loans.use: buy merchandize like makeup, shoes and clothing.

loans.name: Yusufjon

texts.ru: Юсуфчон очень энергичный парень, стремиться построить красивый дом на своем земельном участке.Работает и имеет большой опыт в мясном бизнесе.Он раньше откармливал скот дома и продавал его на скотном рынке.Заодно когда его скот болел, ему пришла мысль обучиться делу мясника,чтобы скорее мог зарезать скот и не искать мясника где-то.Более 10ти лет занимается этим бизнесом. У него в центральном рынке есть мясная лавка и ему помогает его брат.С нашей организацией Юсуфчон работает несколько лет и является активным и порядочным  клиентом.Наш кредит как он говорит,помог ему в расширении его дела, он получал хорошую прибыль и недавно  он купил ещё одну квартиру.На полученный кредит Юсуфчон хочет приобрести скот, которую реализует в своей лавке.
texts.en:
Yusufjon is a very energetic young man. He is currently trying to build a beautiful house on his property. Yusufjon works as a butcher and has extensive experience in this business. Previously, he raised livestock at home and sold it at the animal market. When Yusufjon's animals were sick, it occurred to him to learn the butcher's trade so as to be able to slaughter the animals faster without having to look for someone else. Now, he has been working as a butcher for over 10 years. With his brother's help, Yusufjon runs his shop at the central market.

Yusufjon has been working with MDO Arvand, LLC for several years and has been an active and honest client. He believes that their loans have helped him to grow his business. He has been making good profits and not long ago bought another apartment. Yusufjon would like to use this loan to purchase a cow, whose meat he will sell in his shop.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Brenda Teresa

texts.es: Brenda Teresa de 31 años de edad, con un hijo menor de edad, tiene por actividad economica una pulperia y un taller de soldadura desde hace 10 años, el cual esta ubicado en su casa de habitacion. inicio el negocio para mejorar sus niveles de vida, ya ha tenido credito con Leon 2000 el cual ha demostrado ser responsable, trabajadora, de buenas costumbre, responsable, el financiamiento lo quiere para invertir en capital de trabajo como: arroz, azucar, leña, pan, huevos, jabon de baños, jabon de lavar, frutas, verduras , productos de consumo diario para el hogar.
texts.en: Brenda Teresa is 31 years old with a young son. She works in a small general store and soldering shop for about 10 years which is located in her home. She began her business to improve her quality of life, Brenda has had a loan with Leon 2000 and has shown to be responsible, a hard worker, and with good manners. The loan will be used to buy work capital like rice, sugar, firewood, bread, eggs, bath soap, detergent, fruits, vegetables, and basic household goods.

loans.use: buy work capital like rice, sugar, firewood, bread, eggs, bath soap, detergent, fruits, vegetables, and basic household goods.

loans.name: Islomidin

texts.ru:
Тридцать  лет  назад Исломидин начал свою деятельность в сфере услуги. Он начал свой бизнес чтобы содержать свою семью в хороших условиях жизни. Он занимается ремонтом грузового и легкового автомобиля. В бизнесе занимается один. Имеет много клиентов.    
Женат, жена раньше работала детским врачом в настоящее время она на пенсии, но она  предоставляет медицинскую услугу местным жителям и получает доходы.  Имеет 2-х сыновей, они работают в Российской Федерации и ежемесячно отправляют денежных переводов. Исломидин кредитуется в «Имон Интернешн» несколько лет,  имеет хорошую репутация и отличную кредитную историю. С ранних полученных займов от «Имон Интернешнл» он улучшил свои жилищные условия и благодарен за поддержку. 
Исломидин запрашивает займ в размере 5000 сомони для  приобретения  оборудования для своего бизнеса.
texts.en:
Thirty years ago Islomidin started his business providing a service. He began his business to provide for his family and live in good conditions. He has been repairing trucks and vehicles. He does this business by himself and has a lot of customers.

He is married and his wife had worked as a pediatrician, but at the present time she is retired. She still provides medical services to local residents and receives income. He has two sons, they work in the Russian Federation and send monthly money transfers. Islomidin has been taking loans from IMON International for several years and has a good reputation and excellent credit history. Using the earliest loans from IMON International he has improved his living conditions and is grateful for the support.

Islomidin is requesting a loan of 5,000 somoni to purchase equipment for his business.

loans.use: to purchase equipment for his business.

loans.name: Atipay Group

texts.es:
(La señora Carmen está levantando la mano en la fotografía). La socia Carmen nació en la ciudad de Puno pero actualmente vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco, ella tiene 34 años de edad pero es soltera. Su actividad económica principal de la Carmen es la venta de zapatos. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Carmen requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo zapatos para niños, damas y caballeros. Su sueño de la socia Carmen es abrir otras tiendas en las ciudades de Puerto Maldonado, Sicuani y Quillabamba. 

Este grupo está conformado por vecinos y amigos que formaron el banco comunal “Atipay” en la provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco. Este banco comunal está conformado por personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las actividades económicas de los socios son por ejemplo; preparación de refrigerios, movilidad escolar, docente, apoyo de encuestas, venta de calzados, venta de cosméticos, alquiler de disfraces típicos y otros son restauradores de obras de arte, empleados públicos y otros docentes de música.  

Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. (Los socios que aparecen en la parte inferior de la fotografía llegaron tarde a la reunión del banco comunal). 

Cusco está ubicado en el distrito y provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco en pleno corazón de la antigua ciudad de los Incas y se caracteriza por ser una zona turística, por sus centros arqueológicos, por su centro histórico, por sus paisajes, por su historia y por ser una ciudad encantadora de la Región del Sur del país. Cusco es conocido también por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
(Señora Carmen is raising her hand in the photograph.) Communal bank member Carmen was born in the city of Puno, but now she lives in the beautiful city of Cusco. She is 34 years old but she is single. Her principal business is selling shoes. She has already worked in this business for a number of years, and it is going very well for her. At this time Carmen needs a loan to buy merchandise such as shoes for children, women, and men. Her dream is to open other stores in the cities of Puerto Maldonado, Sicuani, and Quillabamba.

This group consists of neighbors and friends who formed the communal bank "Atipay" in the province and department of Cusco. This communal bank consists of people who are always looking for opportunities to get ahead and with their daily effort to give their children a better future. The businesses of the members include, for example, preparing snacks, school transportation, teacher, survey assistant, and renting traditional costumes. Others are restorers of artwork, public employees, and music teachers.

The members in general are grateful for the opportunity offered and promise to make their loan payments according to schedule. (The members who appear in the lower part of the photo arrived late for the communal bank meeting.)

Cusco is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco, in the very heart of the old city of the Incas. It is characterized by being a tourist area because of its archaeological centers, its historic center, its landscapes, its history, and by being an enchanting city in the southern region of the country. Cusco is also known for its traditional celebration of Inti Raymi and for Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as shoes for children, women, and men

loans.name: Berta Melania

texts.es: Berta melania, casada, de 45 años de edad, con tres hijos mayores tiene por actividad la venta de refresco y comida desde hace tres años, gracias al  responsabilidad con su negocio ha podido mantenerlo y hacerlo crecer ya que la mayoria de sus cliente son los empleado del ingerio san antonio los de las cuadrillas, esta solicitando el financiamiento para la compra de productos para la eboracion de fresco y comida como: pitañas, piñas, carnes, arroz, frijoes, platanos, tortillas, pastas, entre  otros.
texts.en: Berta Melani is married, 45 years old with three adult children. She has worked selling refreshments and food for some three years. Thanks to the management of her business she has been able to keep it and see it grow since most of her customers are employees of the Ingenio San Antonio. She needs the loan to buy products to make refreshments and food like pineapples, meats, rice, beans, plantains, tortillas, pasta and other foodstuffs.

loans.use: buy products to make refreshments and food like pineapples, meats, rice, beans, plantains, tortillas, pasta and other foodstuffs.

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.fr: Gabriel est âgé de 43 ans et vit au Bénin. Gabriel est marié à une couturière du nom de Annick. Le couple a trois enfants, tous à leur charge et dont certains sont scolarisés. Les enfants vivent ensemble avec leurs parents. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Gabriel a arrêté l'école au niveau primaire, puis a appris la couture. Gabriel exerce ce métier depuis une trentaine d'année. En dehors de cette activité, Gabriel vend également des fournitures de couture ; ce qui lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants. Gabriel désire acquérir une nouvelle machine à coudre afin de mieux répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle. Pour cette raison, Gabriel sollicite pour une troisième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les crédits reçus antérieurement par Gabriel ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Gabriel is 43 years old and lives in Benin. Gabriel is married to a seamstress named Annick. The couple has three dependent children, and some of them go to school. The children live together with their parents. Together, the couple takes care of the various household expenses. 

Gabriel stopped going to school after elementary school, and then learned how to sew. Gabriel has been practicing this profession for about 30 years. Outside of this profession, he also sells sewing supplies, and this allows him to meet his needs and the needs of his children. 

Gabriel would like to buy a new sewing machine in order to better meet the demands of his clients. For this reason, Gabriel is asking for his third loan from ALIDé. Gabriel’s past loans have been reimbursed.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Bakhtiyor

texts.ru: Бахтиер- молодой парень, еще не женат и его родители собираются женить его скоро.Но Бахтиер  пока не планирует жениться, так как на первом месте у него стоит карьера.Он отучился и собирается  набрать опыт работы. Он работает в суде  исполнителем суда.Считает свою работу интересной и в будущем у него большие планы.По совету своих коллег по работе он обратился в нашу организацию за кредитом на покупку кондиционера в жаркий период.График погашения понравился ему так как он не мог накопить большую сумму на большую покупку.Он рад что мы сможем ему помочь в финансовом плане.
texts.en:
Bakhtiyor is a young man, not yet married, but his parents are getting ready to marry him soon.  But Bakhtiyor isn't planning on marriage right now, since his career is most important.  He finished school and is going to get work experience.  He is a court bailiff.  He finds his work interesting and he has big plans for the future.  

At the advice of his colleagues, Bakhtiyor applied to our organization for a loan in order to buy an air conditioner for the hot season because he couldn't save up the large sum for the purchase.  He is pleased with the repayment schedule and he is glad that we will be able to help him with his budgeting.

loans.use: to purchase an air conditioner

loans.name: 04.09.3 Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Tỵ has a retail business selling electronics. She is requesting a loan to purchase toys to resell.

Tỵ is 61 years old and she is married with two children. She is the leader of a five-member group, the 04.09.3 Nam Ngạn solidarity group. Tỵ lives with one dependent in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province; one of her children is grown up.

In 2009, Tỵ joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Tỵ has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Tỵ has been involved in this business for three years.

The main hardship that Tỵ faces in her business is a lack of capital.

With her business profit, Tỵ hopes for her children to find good jobs, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase toys to resell.

loans.name: Mavchuda

texts.ru: Мавчуда женщина работающая в государственных органах.Ей 50 лет и у неё трое детей- два сына и дочь -студентка.Берет кредит более два года и каждый кредит использует на оплату учебы своей дочки.Она студентка и ещё не замужем.Сейчас она думает только об учебе.Мавчуда работает в экономическом суде  и её доходы стабильные, хотя заработная плата небольшая.Ей также помогает сын и муж, которые тоже работают.Мавчуде наша финансовая поддержка очень помогла, так как она каждый раз получает круглую сумму и сразу оплачивает договор за учебу дочки на год.Она намерена в дальнейшем тоже сотрудничать с нами.
texts.en: Mavchuda is a woman who works for a government agency. She is 50 years old and has 3 children - two sons and a daughter who is a student.  She has been taking out loans for 2 years and each time she uses the loans to pay tuition for her daughter. She is a student and is not yet married.  Currently she only thinks about her education. Mavchuda works at the Economic Court and has a steady income, however her salary is small. Her son and her husband, who are also working, help her as well. Our financial support really helped Mavchuda as every time she receives a round sum of money and is able to pay the annual tuition contract for her daughter right away.  She intends to collaborate with us in the future.

loans.use: to pay tuition fee for her daughter

loans.name: Ankhbayar

texts.en:
Mr. Ankhbayar is 30 years old and a military man. He lives with his wife and 2 children in an apartment he recently purchased through a loan from a bank. Last August he bought his apartment and made some repairs to it. But it still has some problems such as heat loss and emissions. He is also planning to repair the windows, floor and walls. Last winter was very cold for him and his family without good insulation.
 
Although Mongolia has the lowest population density in the world, it is one of the most polluted countries in the world. This is due to the long and cold winters where temperatures frequently go below -40C (-40F), even in the cities. Also, in winter, many parts of the country become extremely cold and are known to have snow storms. 

Both homes and nomadic tents burn a lot of fuel and emit huge amounts of pollution every night from families just trying to stay warm. In response to this, Credit Mongol offers Green Loans to its clients to make home improvements that reduce heat loss and improve heating systems. We believe that together we can decrease pollution and the harmful effects it has on the environment and Mongolians' health. The loan he is taking will be dedicated to buying building materials to install wall insulation in his home.

loans.use: To buy building materials to install wall insulation in his home.

loans.name: Zarrina

texts.ru: Заррина проживает в районе Хуросон. Ей 30 лет. Она замужем. У нее двое детей. Заррина более четырех лет занимается животноводством. Она берет кредит для закупа телят.
texts.en: Zarrina lives in Khurson. She is 30 years old, married and has two children. Zarrina has been raising cattle for sale for four years. She is taking out this loan to purchase calves.

loans.use: to purchase calves

loans.name: Rahmonali

texts.ru: Рахмонали житель района Хуросон. Ему 40 лет. Он женат. У него семеро детей. Рахмонали более десяти лет занимается растениеводством и скотоводством. Он выращивает овощи и сеет пшеницу. Кроме того разводит крупнорогатый скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Кредит берет для закупа бычков.
texts.en: Rahmonali is a resident of Khurson. He is 40 years old, married and has seven children. Rahmonali has been farming and raising cattle for ten years. He primarily grows vegetables and wheats. He also fattens and resells cattle at the market. Rahmonali is taking out this loan to purchase another calf.

loans.use: to purchase a calf

loans.name: Edison Oswaldo

texts.es:
EDISON OSWALDO tiene 30 años, es casado vive en casa de unos familiares no tiene hijos, vive en la ciudad  de Chimbo Provincia Bolívar.

EDISON OSWALDO se dedica a  la agricultura a la siembra de maíz suave, Solicita el crédito para comprar cemento, barillas, clavos, talabros, madera. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá realizar el mejoramiento de la vivienda.

Realiza sus compras en la ciudad de Guaranda. El desafío al que se enfrenta es mejorar el nivel de vida.

En sus tiempos libres se dedica a jugar boli.
texts.en: Edison is 30 years old, married and lives in a house of one of his relatives. He doesn't have children. He lives in the city of Chimbo, province of Bolivar. Edison makes a living in agriculture, growing sweet corn. He is requesting the loan to purchase cement, rods, nails, drills and wood so he can make improvements to his home. He makes his purchases in the city of Guaranda. The challenges he faces is raising his quality of life. In his free time he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to purchase cement, rods, nails, drills and wood.

loans.name: Anush

texts.ru:
Ануш занимается сельскохозяйственным бизнесом в деревне Гегануш (Geghanush), Сьюникской области, на протяжении почти 20 лет. Ануш разводит крупный рогатый скот, свиней, выращивает овощи и фрукты: яблоки, картофель, капусту и т.д. 
Ануш очень нравиться заниматься сельским хозяйством, благодаря которому она имеет возможность содержать свою семью. Ануш продает полученную сельскохозяйственную продукцию: овощи, фрукты, молоко, говядину и свинину, своим постоянным покупателям в городе Капане, региональном центре Сьюника. 
Ануш 43 года. После окончания школы в городе Капане, Ануш получила специальность портнихи и несколько лет работала на трикотажной фабрике. Ануш замужем и у нее трое детей: сын и две дочери, которые учатся в школе. Муж помогает  жене в ведении сельского хозяйства. 
Ануш необходим кредит в размере $ 600 для организации работ по уборке сена: покупки дизельного топлива, оплаты услуг механизатора, а также для покупки веревки для перевязки сена.
texts.en: Anush has been a farmer in the village of Geghanush, Syuhnik region for twenty years. She raises cattle and pigs and grows vegetables and fruit such as apples, potatoes and cabbage. Anush loves farming and is grateful to be able to support her family doing something she loves. She sells her produce and meat and has regular customers in Kapan, the regional center of Syuhnik. Anush is 43 years old, after finishing high school in Kapan she started working as a seamstress at a clothing factory. She is married and has three children: a son and two daughters who are still in school. Her husband helps his wife on the farm. Anush is requesting a loan of $600 to pay for the hay harvest expenses: fuel costs, harvesting machine operator fee as well as ropes to tie the bales.

loans.use: to buy diesel fuel, to pay for hired machine operator and to buy rope for hay bales

loans.name: Alona

texts.en:
Alona is 35 years old and married with two children age 7 and 8.

She supports her family by selling bread in the neighborhood of Tagbilaran with the use of her bicycle. Her husband also does the same. 

Alona is asking for a loan to buy a spare tire, styrofoam to keep the bread fresh, and to pay vulcanizing fees to maintain her bike.

She is working hard to meet the needs of her children. Her income will keep her two children in school and provide for her family's daily food consumption.

loans.use: to buy a spare tire, styrofoam to keep bread fresh, and to pay vulcanizing fees to maintain her bike.

loans.name: Ivanna

texts.ru:
Иванна замужем, имеет двоих детей. Иванна живет в городе Богислав (Западная Украина) и продает тапочки, колготки, шлепанцы и прочий товар на выезде. У нее нет одной постоянной торговой точки. Иванна ездит по близлежащим селам и предлагает свой товар. У Иванны широкий ассортимент  товара, что привлекает покупателей. За 15 лет работы у Иванны появилось много постоянных клиентов, благодаря чему ее бизнес успешно развивается.

Иванна просит предоставить ей кредит в сумне 8,000 гривен на закупку летней обуви. Она надеется звеличить оборот и получить дополнительную прибыль, что поможет ей лучше обеспечивать свою семью.
texts.en: Ivanna is married and has two children. She lives in Bogislav (Western Ukraine) and sells house shoes, tights, flip flops and other things from her car. She has no regular market stall. Ivanna drives to the surrounding villages and sells her wares there. She has a wide variety of things for sale, which attracts more clients. During fifteen years of business Ivana has acquired many regular clients and that helps her business grow. Ivanna wants to take out a loan of 8000 griven to purchase summer shoes for resale. She is hoping to increase inventory turn over and earn additional profits which will help her support her family.

loans.use: to purchase summer shoes

loans.name: Luis Vinicio

texts.es:
LUIS VINICIO tiene 31 años de edad, es soltero no tiene hijos,  vive en casa de unos familiares en la ciudad de Chimbo Provincia Bolívar.

LUIS VINICIO se dedica a la venta de ropa de damas y caballeros. Solicita el crédito para comprar pantalones, chompas, interiores. 

Con el apoyo del crédito va a poder comprar la mercadería para ampliar el negocio.

Realiza las compras y ventas en la ciudad de Guaranda. El desafío al que se enfrenta es mejorar su nivel de vida.
En su tiempo libre se dedica a jugar futbol.
texts.en:
31-year-old Luis Vinicio is single, has no children, and lives with relatives in the city of Chimbo, Bolivar province. He sells mens and womens clothing, and is requesting this loan to purchase pants, sweaters, and home decor. With the support of the loan he will be able to buy merchandise to expand his business. 

Luis Vinicio buys and sells his merchandise in the city of Guaranda. His main challenge is to improve his standard of living. In his spare time, he enjoys playing football.

loans.use: to purchase pants, sweaters, and home decor

loans.name: Khushmahmad

texts.ru: Хушмахмад проживает в районе А. Джоми. Ему 55 лет. Он женат. У него шестеро детей. Его дети находятся в России. Сам Хушмахмад занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. В этой области он имеет богатый опыт. Кредит берет для закупа семян.
texts.en: Khushmahmad lives in A. Jomi region. He is 55 years old, married and has six children. His children are away, working in Russia. Khushmahmad himself is a farmer and has a lot of experience working the land. He is requesting this loan to purchase seeds.

loans.use: to purchase seeds

loans.name: Sokleang's Group

texts.en:
Sokleang is from the Sa Ang district of Kandal province, Cambodia. She is 42 years old and widowed with two sons, who are still in her care and work as paid workers at a garment factory. She has been involved in rice farming and has worked as a garment worker for six years. 

This is the first loan for Sokleang’s group of four members. She is leading her group to apply for a loan of KHR 500,000 each. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland and refill her house with land.  She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her family's income to improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland.

loans.name: Patricio Xavier

texts.es:
PATRICIO XAVIER tiene 20 años es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en la ciudad de Guaranda Provincia Bolívar.

PATRICIO XAVIER  se dedica al cultivo de maíz. Solicita el crédito para comprar urea, líquidos para la maleza, insecticidas.

Con el apoyo del crédito va a mejorar la producción de su siembra. El sueño del señor es ampliar los sembríos.

El desafío al que se enfrenta el señor es en caso de existir alguna plaga combatirla para no perder la producción.
En su tiempo libre le gusta jugar al futbol
texts.en:
20-year-old Patricio Xavier is single, has no children, and lives with his parents in the city of Guaranda, Bolivar Province. He cultivates corn. He is requesting this loan to buy fertilizer, weedkiller and insecticides. The support of the loan will help him to improve the production from his crops.

Patricio Xavier's dream is to increase his harvests. The main challenge he faces is combatting the pests that threaten his crop. Patricio Xavier enjoys playing football in his spare time.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, weedkiller and insecticides.

loans.name: 04.12.8 Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Phúc operates a food stall/restaurant selling rice noodles. She is requesting a loan to purchase materials to make the processed food to sell.  Phúc is 38 years old and she is married with two children.  She is the leader of a three-member-group, the 04.12.8 Nam Ngạn solidarity group. 

Phúc lives with one dependent in Thanh Hoa City, a urban town in Thanh Hoa province, and one children lives on a government scholarship.  This is her first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.  She has been involved in this business for seven years.  The main hardship that Phúc faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Phúc hopes for her children to do well in school, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase materials to make processed food to sell.

loans.name: Arandu Raity Group

texts.es:
El Comite de Mujeres Arandu Raity es del chaco, tiene 10 miembros, donde todas se esfuerzan al máximo para poder salir adelante y ayudar a sus familias. El grupo se encuentra en el primer ciclo del programa de la fundación paraguaya y desea poder seguir creciendo y ayudando a sus familias.
La  Sra Adela se dedica a la venta de budin y empanadas, y cuenta que tiene buena venta, pues ya tiene buena cantidad de clientes que siempre compran de ellas los productos que vende. Su meta es poder tener un local de alimentos bien grande, donde poder vender los productos que tiene.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de verduras, carne, condimentos y demás insumos para poder seguir haciendo los alimentos que vende. Agradece por la ayuda que está recibiendo por parte de Kiva y fundación paraguaya.
texts.en:
The Arandu Raity Women's Committee is based in Chaco and has 10 members, all of whom are trying their best to succeed and help their families. The group is in the first cycle of the fundación paraguaya program, and they want to continue to grow and help their families.

Mrs. Adela sells puddings and pies, and tells us that business is good - she already has plenty of customers who regularly purchase her products. Her goal is to have a good size premises, where she can sell the products she makes. Adela is requesting a loan to buy vegetables, meat, condiments and other supplies to keep producing the food that she sells. She is grateful for the help she is receiving from Kiva and fundación paraguaya.

loans.use: to buy meat, condiments and other supplies

loans.name: Rano

texts.ru: Рано женщина в возрасте 50 лет, замужем имеет 4 детей. Старшие дочери вышли замуж, у нее 3 внуков. Рано торгует в течении 16 лет на рынке рисом. Она сотрудничает с нашей организацией с 2007 года. Первый кредит получила в 2003 на торговлю продуктами питания. За несколько лет сотрудничества с нашей организацией несколько раз изменила  ассортимент  товара. Перепробовала торговлю на разные виды товаров и сейчас остановилась на торговли риса. Общий стаж  её предпринимательской деятельности  составляет более 14 лет. В бизнесе помогает ее сын. Муж также торгует в магазине красками. Очень активная клиентка за период кредитования не имела ни одну просрочку, ее товар имеет большой спрос.На полученный кредит хочет приобрести несколько мешков риса.
texts.en: Rano is 50 years old, married and has four children. Her oldest daughters are now also married and Rano has three grandchildren. Rano has worked with our organization since 2007. Her first loan was in 2003 to purchase groceries for resale. In the last few years she tried her hand at selling several different goods but has now focused on rice sales. Her entire retail experience is about 14 years. Her son helps Rano with her business. Her husband sells paints in a store. Rano is an active client with our organization and has never delayed a payment on a loan. The items she sells are always in high demand. Rano wants to use this loan to purchase several bags of rice for resale.

loans.use: Purchase bags of rice

loans.name: Las Bugambilias Group

texts.es:
María Anabel cuenta con 39 años de edad, está casada con el señor Baltasar quien es maestro y viven felizmente con sus cuatro hijos; uno de ellos se llama Jonathan tiene 20 años y está estudiando Medicina, Juan Manuel tiene 18 años y también  estudia Medicina, Jaret tiene 16 años y cursa 1° de bachillerato y Jamileth  de 12 años, cursa 6° de primaria.

Anabel es comerciante, tiene un negocio de venta de pollo destazado. Comenta que dependiendo de sus ventas es el número de pollos que mata. Por ejemplo, en una buena temporada, vende dos cajas, que es como ella compra el pollo. Cada caja contiene diez pollos, es decir, que puede vender cerca de 20 pollos y cuando las ventas están bajas sólo vende 12 o 15 pollos al día. Anabel tiene 10 años de experiencia en el negocio y quiere invertir su préstamo en más cajas. Además, comenta que gracias a sus ganancias nunca les ha faltado nada a sus hijos. Una de sus grandes metas es sacar a sus hijos a delante para que terminen su educación superior. 

Anabel integra el grupo Las Bugambilias, dicho grupo está formado por ocho mujeres y dos hombres dedicados a su labor y con esfuerzo, dedicación y responsabilidad han salido adelante por sus familias. A continuación serán mencionados y cada una de las actividades que realizan: Eduardo vende comida, Maricruz Ericka vende pan, Genoveva vende tamales y atole, Balbina tiene su negocio de modas, María Anabel vende pollos, Ernestina vende plásticos,  Aida vende ropa, Jorge Luis tiene un taxi de transporte, Ada Iris vende comida, Mercedes vende productos de abarrotes.
texts.en:
María Anabel is 39 years old and married to Sr. Baltasar, who is a teacher. They are happily married and have four children: Jonathan is 20 and studying medicine, Juan Manuel is 18 and also studying medicine, Jaret is 16 and in the first year of high school, and Jamileth is 12 and in the sixth grade.

Anabel is a merchant who has a business of selling butchered chickens. She says that her sales depend on the number of chickens that are slaughtered. For example, in a good season, she wills sell two cases of chickens, which is how they are sold. Each case contains 10 chickens, which means that she can sell nearly 20 chickens. When sales are low, she sells anywhere between 12 and 15 chickens per day. Anabel has 10 years of experience in this business and wants to invest her loan in more cases of chickens. Thanks to her earnings, her children never lack anything. One of her greatest wishes is to see her children press forward and finish their higher education.

Anabel joined the group “Las Bugambilias”, which consists of eight women and two men who are dedicated to their work. With effort, dedication, and responsibility, they have been able to move forward on behalf of their families. Listed below are the members and each of their business activities: • Eduardo sells food. • Maricruz Ericka sells bread. • Genoveva sells tamales and “atole” (a warm beverage made with cornmeal). • Balbina has a trendy clothing business. • María Anabel sells chickens. • Ernestina sells plastics. • Aida sells clothing. • Jorge Luis manages a taxi. • Ada Iris sells food. • Mercedes sells groceries.

loans.use: to buy several cases of chicken.

location.town: Cruz Grande, Municipio Florencio Villareal, Estado

loans.name: Gankhuyag

texts.en:
Mr. Gankhuyag runs intercity passenger transportation. It is currently the main source of income for his family. He has been running his business since 2011 and he is a professional and skilful driver. 

He lives with his wife and niece in a ger district, an area with no running water, minimal roads and spotty electricity, in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. His son and daughter live and work in privation in Korea. 

Last year, they both bought a bus for their father to start his transportation business. Now Gankhuyag runs his business very successfully and he has gained a profit. But lately all of the tires of his bus have become bad and old, such that he can’t use them anymore. 

To this end, he is requesting a loan to cover the cost of six new tires for his bus, in order to continue running his business normally.

loans.use: To cover the cost of six new tires for his bus.

loans.name: Eleidy Relina

texts.es: Eleidy, tiene 33 años de edad, vive en Olanchito, Yoro, junto a su esposo y sus 4 hijos. Ella tiene 6 años de tener su propio negocio de venta de comidas. Elabora hamburguesas, tacos, carne a la plancha, nacatamales, enchiladas, etc. este negocio lo tiene en su casa y lo ha mantenido estable mediante la inversión de varios préstamos y le ha ido muy bien, han sido de gran ayuda para su negocio. Esta solicitando Lps.11,000.00 para comprar insumos para la elaboración de comidas como ser: carnes, pan, harina de maíz, aceite, etc. y hacer crecer el negocio poco a poco. Su meta es continuar trabajando y mejorar en el negocio para salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Eleidy is 33 years old and lives in Olanchito with her husband and their four children.

For the past six years, she has managed her own business of selling food. Eleidy prepares hamburgers, tacos, grilled meats, tamales, enchiladas, and other dishes. This business is located at her home and she has kept it stable by investing several loans that have been a great help. As a result, she has done very well.

Eleidy is requesting 11,000 HNL so that she can buy supplies for preparing her dishes such as meat, bread, cornmeal, oil, and other items in order to grow her business a little bit at a time. Her goal is to continue working and improving her business so that her family can get ahead.

loans.use: to buy supplies for preparing her dishes.

loans.name: Balcones Group

texts.es:
EL GRUPO BALCONES ES UN GRUPO SOLIDARIO  DE CREDITUYO ,ESTA INTEGRADO POR 6 PERSONAS, SUS NOMBRES SON  MARTHA DORA MA PETRA ,LIDIA GLORIA Y ROSALBA  ELLAS SON VECINAS Y AMIGAS DESDE HACE CASI 10 AÑOS, ELLAS SON MUY TRABAJADORAS YA QUE TODAS TIENEN SUEÑOS DE LLEGAR A TENER UN NEGOCIO ,BIEN ESTABLECIDO YA QUE LA MAYORIA DE ELLAS SE DEDICAN ALA VENTA DE CALZADO Y COMIDAS.
DORA ES UNA DE LAS INTEGRANTES DEL GRUPO,ELLA ES CASADA  TIENE 40AÑOS DE EDAD  TIENE SOLO UNA HIJA DE 16 AÑOS ELLA SE DEDICA ALA VENTA DE HAMURGUESAS ,Y HOTDOGS VENDE LOS FINES DE SEMANA  EN SU DOMICILIO ,TAMBIEN SE DEDICA ALA VENTA DE BANQUETES.  SU CREDITO LO PIENSA UTILIZAR EN LA COMPRA DE UN CARRITO PARA HOT DOGS, Y ASI ABARCAR MAS MERCADO.  EL SUEÑO DE DORA ES LLEGAR A TENER VARIOS CARRITOS ,PARA LA VENTA DE HOT DOGS Y TENER EMPLEADOS QUE LOS ATIENDAN EN VARIOS PUNTOS DE LA CIUDAD. PAR PODER TENER UNA VIDA MEJOR Y PODER PAGAR LOS ESTUDIOS UNIVERSITARIOS DE SU HIJA SIN NINGUN PROBLEMA
texts.en:
The solidarity group 'Balcones' has 6 members, whose names are Martha, Dora, Ma Petra, Lidia, Gloria and Rosalba. They have been neighbors and friends for almost 10 years. They are very hard working women and all have a dream of having their own established business. Most of them sell footwear and meals.

Dore is one of the members. She is 40 years old and married with one daughter, aged 16. Dora sells hamburgers and hot dogs at the weekends from her doorway, and she also sells meals. She will use her loan to purchase a cart for selling hot dogs, so she can reach a wider market. Dora's dream is to own several hot dog carts and employ people in various parts of the city. She aims to have a better life and be able to pay her daughter's college fees without any problems.

loans.use: to purchase a hot dog cart

loans.name: Acahay Poty Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres Acahay Poty empieza a trabajar con la Fundación Paraguaya desde este año, mediante la promoción hecha a una de las miembros. Actualmente el comité está integrado por 12 señoras de la misma zona, cada una cuenta con un negocio propio que les genera ingresos.
Amada es una persona muy trabajadora y con muchas ganas de crecer, nos cuenta que se dedica a la venta de remedios naturales, que sale a vender de forma ambulante. Su deseo es seguir trabajando y de esa forma poder ayudar a su familia.
Solicita el crédito para poder comprar remedios naturales y de esa forma seguir en sus negocios. Agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo, pues le será de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
The Acahay Poty Women's Committee start working with Fundación Paraguaya this year, through one of the members who had heard about it. The committee is made up of 12 women from the same area, each of whom have a business that generates revenue.

Amada is a hard working woman who is eager to grow, and she tells us that she sells natural medicines. She sells her products by making rounds in her neighborhood. Her desire is to continue working and to help her family.

Amada is requesting a loan to buy natural medicines, which will help her to stay in business. She is grateful for the opportunity she is receiving, as it will be a great help to her.

loans.use: to purchase natural medicines to sell

loans.name: Isabelino

texts.es:
El Sr. Isabelino  tiene  45 años, está casado con la Sra. Ramona hace más 20 años, tienen dos hijos juntos, por quienes siempre se esfuerzan al máximo para poder darles lo que necesitan.
El Sr. Isabelino es comerciante, se dedica a la venta y distribución de Juegos de Azar hace 16 años, él es oriundo de Pte. Franco y se mudó a Coronel Oviedo en busca de oportunidades, comenta que le va bien, se siente muy ovetense ya que en la ciudad pudo realizar sus sueños, el negocio propio que funciono gracias al apoyo de sus vecinos y amigos.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de juegos de azar, y de esa forma poder seguir trabajando para poder dar a su familia todo lo que pueden. Agradece por la ayuda que está recibiendo, pues le será de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
Mr. Isabelino is 45 years old and has been married to Mrs. Ramona for over 20 years; they have two children for whom they always work hard to give them all they need.

Mr. Isabelino is a salesman; he has sold games of chance (like the lottery) for 16 years. He is originally from Pte. Franco and moved to Coronel Oviedo to have better job prospects and says that he does very well and feels like a native Ovetense since the city has enabled him to make his dreams come true. The business that he owns is thanks to the support of his neighbors and friends.

Mr. Isabelino needs the loan to buy games of chance so that he can continue working to give his family all that they need. He is grateful for the help since it is of great benefit to him.

loans.use: buy games of chance.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es: Doña Miriam es docente titulada en Pedagogia, trabaja como asesora pedagogica en el MINED de esta ciudad, requiere de este financiamiento, para construir un dormitorio en su casa de habitacióny brindar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.  Sueña con ir poco a poco acondicionando su vivienda pues es la herencia que dejara a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Doña Miriam is a teacher who has a degree in Education. She works in the city as a consultant for the Ministry of Education.

Miriam is requesting this loan so that she can build a bedroom in her house in order to provide better living conditions for her family. She dreams of gradually remodeling her home so that she can leave it as an inheritance for her children.

loans.use: to build a room in her home.

loans.name: Artemia

texts.en:
Artemia is 58 years old with four grown children. She is from Tagbilaran City.

She is working hard in her scrap business to meet her family’s basic household needs. For 30 years, she has been engaged in buying and selling scrap items like empty bottles, scrap iron, empty cans and plastics. She is asking for a loan to buy more scrap materials from her customers.  

In the future, she would like to improve her business and make it even bigger so she can have a better profit and save enough for old age.

loans.use: to buy more scrap materials

loans.name: Altantsetseg

texts.en:
Mrs. Altantsetseg, 56, is a pensioner who lives with her family in her old common apartment in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Even though she is retired, she is still a very hard worker and an aggressive one. Her apartment was built in the communist era and since then it has never been repaired or renovated. Last year, it lost too much heat and emissions through the wall and windows. She uses a furnace that uses smoky and toxic coal to stay warm at home. It costs too much and causes air pollution. 

Although Mongolia has the lowest population density in the world, it is one of the most polluted countries in the world. This is due to the long and cold winters where temperatures frequently go below -40C even in the cities.  Also, in winter, many parts of the country are extremely cold and are known to have snowstorms.  Both homes and nomadic tents burn a lot of fuel and emit huge amounts of pollution every night from families just trying to stay warm.  In response to this, Credit Mongol offers Green Loans to their clients to make home improvements that reduce heat loss and improve heating systems. Credit Mongolia believe that together with the borrower, they can decrease pollution and the harmful effects it has on the environment and Mongolians' health. 

The loan she is taking will be dedicated to buying the building materials needed to insulate the walls and make other repairs.

loans.use: To buy materials to make home repairs

loans.name: 3.3.160.thiệu Lý Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Luận Lê works in agriculture farming food. She is requesting a loan to purchase cattle to raise and sell in the future.

Luận Lê is 52 years old and married with three children. She is the group leader of the 3.3.160.Thiệu Lý solidarity group, which consists of eight members.
 
Luận Lê lives with no dependents in Thieu Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her children are grown.

In 2003, Luận Lê joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid eight loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Luận Lê has been involved in her business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital. With her business profit, Luận Lê hopes to buy land of her own. She also hopes that her children will find a good job and that she will be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to raise and sell

loans.name: Paz Y Alegria Group

texts.es:
El comité Paz y Alegría es de la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo, son 17 mujeres trabajadoras y humildes que deben ganarse el sustento todos los días. Ellas  son independientes en sus labores, pero también trabajan juntas para poder ayudarse.
Bernardina es la presidenta del grupo, ella comenta que siempre trata de incentivar a sus compañeras a luchar por sus metas y sus sueños, para que no se den por vencidas. Ella se dedica a la venta de chipa, en lo que le va muy bien, ya que siempre es muy consumido en todo tiempo, haga frio o calor.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de chipas, ya que quiere seguir con sus ventas porque gracias a ellas ha podido ayudar a su familia y cubrir los gastos del día a día.
texts.en:
The communal bank Peace and Happines is from the city of Coronel Oviedo, it is comprised of 17 hardworking and humble women who earn their living everyday. They are independent in their respective jobs but work together to help each other.

Bernardina is the president of the group and says that she always tries to motivate her fellow members to go after their goals and dreams so that they won’t give up. She sells chipa (a type of bread made with yucca starch and cheese) and does very well since it is eaten all the time, rain or shine.

Bernardina needs the loan to buy chipas, since she wants to continue her sales because thanks to them she has been able to help her family and meet their day to day expenses.

loans.use: buy chipas to sell.

loans.name: Undrakh

texts.en:
Mrs. Undrakh, 29, is a hairdresser who rents a cellar room for 150,000 MNT a month. She has been running her business for three years nonstop. She lives with her parents in an old common apartment, which is in the boundary district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Last May, her family purchased a small plot of land and a house in the ger district. A ger is a Mongolian traditional nomadic tent.  The house still needs some extra repairs, especially to the walls, roof, floor, and windows. She hopes that her house will be comfortable and have less heat loss or emissions after the repairs. The loan she is taking will be dedicated to buying the building materials needed to insulate the walls and make other repairs to the house that her family bought.
